00080 enum {
00081     MESHCMP_DVERT_WEIGHTMISMATCH = 1,
00082     MESHCMP_DVERT_GROUPMISMATCH,
00083     MESHCMP_DVERT_TOTGROUPMISMATCH,
00084     MESHCMP_LOOPCOLMISMATCH,
00085     MESHCMP_LOOPUVMISMATCH,
00086     MESHCMP_LOOPMISMATCH,
00087     MESHCMP_POLYVERTMISMATCH,
00088     MESHCMP_POLYMISMATCH,
00089     MESHCMP_EDGEUNKNOWN,
00090     MESHCMP_VERTCOMISMATCH,
00091     MESHCMP_CDLAYERS_MISMATCH,
00092 };
00093 
00094 static const char *cmpcode_to_str(int code)
00095 {
00096     switch (code) {
00097         case MESHCMP_DVERT_WEIGHTMISMATCH:
00098             return "Vertex Weight Mismatch";
00099         case MESHCMP_DVERT_GROUPMISMATCH:
00100                     return "Vertex Group Mismatch";
00101         case MESHCMP_DVERT_TOTGROUPMISMATCH:
00102                     return "Vertex Doesn't Belong To Same Number Of Groups";
00103         case MESHCMP_LOOPCOLMISMATCH:
00104                     return "Vertex Color Mismatch";
00105         case MESHCMP_LOOPUVMISMATCH:
00106                     return "UV Mismatch";
00107         case MESHCMP_LOOPMISMATCH:
00108                     return "Loop Mismatch";
00109         case MESHCMP_POLYVERTMISMATCH:
00110                     return "Loop Vert Mismatch In Poly Test";
00111         case MESHCMP_POLYMISMATCH:
00112                     return "Loop Vert Mismatch";
00113         case MESHCMP_EDGEUNKNOWN:
00114                     return "Edge Mismatch";
00115         case MESHCMP_VERTCOMISMATCH:
00116                     return "Vertex Coordinate Mismatch";
00117         case MESHCMP_CDLAYERS_MISMATCH:
00118                     return "CustomData Layer Count Mismatch";
00119         default:
00120                 return "Mesh Comparison Code Unknown";
00121         }
00122 }
00123 
00124 /* thresh is threshold for comparing vertices, uvs, vertex colors,
00125  * weights, etc.*/
00126 static int customdata_compare(CustomData *c1, CustomData *c2, Mesh *m1, Mesh *m2, float thresh)
00127 {
00128     CustomDataLayer *l1, *l2;
00129     int i, i1=0, i2=0, tot, j;
00130     
00131     for (i=0; i<c1->totlayer; i++) {
00132         if (ELEM7(c1->layers[i].type, CD_MVERT, CD_MEDGE, CD_MPOLY, 
00133                   CD_MLOOPUV, CD_MLOOPCOL, CD_MTEXPOLY, CD_MDEFORMVERT))        
00134             i1++;
00135     }
00136     
00137     for (i=0; i<c2->totlayer; i++) {
00138         if (ELEM7(c2->layers[i].type, CD_MVERT, CD_MEDGE, CD_MPOLY, 
00139                   CD_MLOOPUV, CD_MLOOPCOL, CD_MTEXPOLY, CD_MDEFORMVERT))        
00140             i2++;
00141     }
00142     
00143     if (i1 != i2)
00144         return MESHCMP_CDLAYERS_MISMATCH;
00145     
00146     l1 = c1->layers; l2 = c2->layers;
00147     tot = i1;
00148     i1 = 0; i2 = 0; 
00149     for (i=0; i < tot; i++) {
00150         while (i1 < c1->totlayer && !ELEM7(l1->type, CD_MVERT, CD_MEDGE, CD_MPOLY, 
00151                   CD_MLOOPUV, CD_MLOOPCOL, CD_MTEXPOLY, CD_MDEFORMVERT))
00152             i1++, l1++;
00153 
00154         while (i2 < c2->totlayer && !ELEM7(l2->type, CD_MVERT, CD_MEDGE, CD_MPOLY, 
00155                   CD_MLOOPUV, CD_MLOOPCOL, CD_MTEXPOLY, CD_MDEFORMVERT))
00156             i2++, l2++;
00157         
00158         if (l1->type == CD_MVERT) {
00159             MVert *v1 = l1->data;
00160             MVert *v2 = l2->data;
00161             int vtot = m1->totvert;
00162             
00163             for (j=0; j<vtot; j++, v1++, v2++) {
00164                 if (len_v3v3(v1->co, v2->co) > thresh)
00165                     return MESHCMP_VERTCOMISMATCH;
00166                 /*I don't care about normals, let's just do coodinates*/
00167             }
00168         }
00169         
00170         /*we're order-agnostic for edges here*/
00171         if (l1->type == CD_MEDGE) {
00172             MEdge *e1 = l1->data;
00173             MEdge *e2 = l2->data;
00174             EdgeHash *eh = BLI_edgehash_new();
00175             int etot = m1->totedge;
00176         
00177             for (j=0; j<etot; j++, e1++) {
00178                 BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, e1->v1, e1->v2, e1);
00179             }
00180             
00181             for (j=0; j<etot; j++, e2++) {
00182                 if (!BLI_edgehash_lookup(eh, e2->v1, e2->v2))
00183                     return MESHCMP_EDGEUNKNOWN;
00184             }
00185             BLI_edgehash_free(eh, NULL);
00186         }
00187         
00188         if (l1->type == CD_MPOLY) {
00189             MPoly *p1 = l1->data;
00190             MPoly *p2 = l2->data;
00191             int ptot = m1->totpoly;
00192         
00193             for (j=0; j<ptot; j++, p1++, p2++) {
00194                 MLoop *lp1, *lp2;
00195                 int k;
00196                 
00197                 if (p1->totloop != p2->totloop)
00198                     return MESHCMP_POLYMISMATCH;
00199                 
00200                 lp1 = m1->mloop + p1->loopstart;
00201                 lp2 = m2->mloop + p2->loopstart;
00202                 
00203                 for (k=0; k<p1->totloop; k++, lp1++, lp2++) {
00204                     if (lp1->v != lp2->v)
00205                         return MESHCMP_POLYVERTMISMATCH;
00206                 }
00207             }
00208         }
00209         if (l1->type == CD_MLOOP) {
00210             MLoop *lp1 = l1->data;
00211             MLoop *lp2 = l2->data;
00212             int ltot = m1->totloop;
00213         
00214             for (j=0; j<ltot; j++, lp1++, lp2++) {
00215                 if (lp1->v != lp2->v)
00216                     return MESHCMP_LOOPMISMATCH;
00217             }
00218         }
00219         if (l1->type == CD_MLOOPUV) {
00220             MLoopUV *lp1 = l1->data;
00221             MLoopUV *lp2 = l2->data;
00222             int ltot = m1->totloop;
00223         
00224             for (j=0; j<ltot; j++, lp1++, lp2++) {
00225                 if (len_v2v2(lp1->uv, lp2->uv) > thresh)
00226                     return MESHCMP_LOOPUVMISMATCH;
00227             }
00228         }
00229         
00230         if (l1->type == CD_MLOOPCOL) {
00231             MLoopCol *lp1 = l1->data;
00232             MLoopCol *lp2 = l2->data;
00233             int ltot = m1->totloop;
00234         
00235             for (j=0; j<ltot; j++, lp1++, lp2++) {
00236                 if (ABS(lp1->r - lp2->r) > thresh || 
00237                     ABS(lp1->g - lp2->g) > thresh || 
00238                     ABS(lp1->b - lp2->b) > thresh || 
00239                     ABS(lp1->a - lp2->a) > thresh)
00240                 {
00241                     return MESHCMP_LOOPCOLMISMATCH;
00242                 }
00243             }
00244         }
00245 
00246         if (l1->type == CD_MDEFORMVERT) {
00247             MDeformVert *dv1 = l1->data;
00248             MDeformVert *dv2 = l2->data;
00249             int dvtot = m1->totvert;
00250         
00251             for (j=0; j<dvtot; j++, dv1++, dv2++) {
00252                 int k;
00253                 MDeformWeight *dw1 = dv1->dw, *dw2=dv2->dw;
00254                 
00255                 if (dv1->totweight != dv2->totweight)
00256                     return MESHCMP_DVERT_TOTGROUPMISMATCH;
00257                 
00258                 for (k=0; k<dv1->totweight; k++, dw1++, dw2++) {
00259                     if (dw1->def_nr != dw2->def_nr)
00260                         return MESHCMP_DVERT_GROUPMISMATCH;
00261                     if (ABS(dw1->weight - dw2->weight) > thresh)
00262                         return MESHCMP_DVERT_WEIGHTMISMATCH;
00263                 }
00264             }
00265         }
00266     }
00267     
00268     return 0;
00269 }
00270 
00271 /*used for testing.  returns an error string the two meshes don't match*/
00272 const char *mesh_cmp(Mesh *me1, Mesh *me2, float thresh)
00273 {
00274     int c;
00275     
00276     if (!me1 || !me2)
00277         return "Requires two input meshes";
00278     
00279     if (me1->totvert != me2->totvert) 
00280         return "Number of verts don't match";
00281     
00282     if (me1->totedge != me2->totedge)
00283         return "Number of edges don't match";
00284     
00285     if (me1->totpoly != me2->totpoly)
00286         return "Number of faces don't match";
00287                 
00288     if (me1->totloop !=me2->totloop)
00289         return "Number of loops don't match";
00290     
00291     if ((c = customdata_compare(&me1->vdata, &me2->vdata, me1, me2, thresh)))
00292         return cmpcode_to_str(c);
00293 
00294     if ((c = customdata_compare(&me1->edata, &me2->edata, me1, me2, thresh)))
00295         return cmpcode_to_str(c);
00296 
00297     if ((c = customdata_compare(&me1->ldata, &me2->ldata, me1, me2, thresh)))
00298         return cmpcode_to_str(c);
00299 
00300     if ((c = customdata_compare(&me1->pdata, &me2->pdata, me1, me2, thresh)))
00301         return cmpcode_to_str(c);
00302     
00303     return NULL;
00304 }
00305 
00306 static void mesh_ensure_tessellation_customdata(Mesh *me)
00307 {
00308     if (UNLIKELY((me->totface != 0) && (me->totpoly == 0))) {
00309         /* Pass, otherwise this function  clears 'mface' before
00310          * versioning 'mface -> mpoly' code kicks in [#30583]
00311          *
00312          * Callers could also check but safer to do here - campbell */
00313     }
00314     else {
00315         const int tottex_original = CustomData_number_of_layers(&me->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00316         const int totcol_original = CustomData_number_of_layers(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00317 
00318         const int tottex_tessface = CustomData_number_of_layers(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE);
00319         const int totcol_tessface = CustomData_number_of_layers(&me->fdata, CD_MCOL);
00320 
00321         if (tottex_tessface != tottex_original ||
00322             totcol_tessface != totcol_original )
00323         {
00324             BKE_mesh_tessface_clear(me);
00325 
00326             CustomData_from_bmeshpoly(&me->fdata, &me->pdata, &me->ldata, me->totface);
00327 
00328             /* TODO - add some --debug-mesh option */
00329             if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) {
00330                 /* note: this warning may be un-called for if we are initializing the mesh for the
00331                  * first time from bmesh, rather then giving a warning about this we could be smarter
00332                  * and check if there was any data to begin with, for now just print the warning with
00333                  * some info to help troubleshoot whats going on - campbell */
00334                 printf("%s: warning! Tessellation uvs or vcol data got out of sync, "
00335                        "had to reset!\n    CD_MTFACE: %d != CD_MTEXPOLY: %d || CD_MCOL: %d != CD_MLOOPCOL: %d\n",
00336                        __func__, tottex_tessface, tottex_original, totcol_tessface, totcol_original);
00337             }
00338         }
00339     }
00340 }
00341 
00342 /* this ensures grouped customdata (e.g. mtexpoly and mloopuv and mtface, or
00343  * mloopcol and mcol) have the same relative active/render/clone/mask indices.
00344  *
00345  * note that for undo mesh data we want to skip 'ensure_tess_cd' call since
00346  * we don't want to store memory for tessface when its only used for older
00347  * versions of the mesh. - campbell*/
00348 static void mesh_update_linked_customdata(Mesh *me, const short do_ensure_tess_cd)
00349 {
00350     if (me->edit_btmesh)
00351         BMEdit_UpdateLinkedCustomData(me->edit_btmesh);
00352 
00353     if (do_ensure_tess_cd) {
00354         mesh_ensure_tessellation_customdata(me);
00355     }
00356 
00357     CustomData_bmesh_update_active_layers(&me->fdata, &me->pdata, &me->ldata);
00358 }
00359 
00360 void mesh_update_customdata_pointers(Mesh *me, const short do_ensure_tess_cd)
00361 {
00362     mesh_update_linked_customdata(me, do_ensure_tess_cd);
00363 
00364     me->mvert = CustomData_get_layer(&me->vdata, CD_MVERT);
00365     me->dvert = CustomData_get_layer(&me->vdata, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00366     me->msticky = CustomData_get_layer(&me->vdata, CD_MSTICKY);
00367 
00368     me->medge = CustomData_get_layer(&me->edata, CD_MEDGE);
00369 
00370     me->mface = CustomData_get_layer(&me->fdata, CD_MFACE);
00371     me->mcol = CustomData_get_layer(&me->fdata, CD_MCOL);
00372     me->mtface = CustomData_get_layer(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE);
00373     
00374     me->mpoly = CustomData_get_layer(&me->pdata, CD_MPOLY);
00375     me->mloop = CustomData_get_layer(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOP);
00376 
00377     me->mtpoly = CustomData_get_layer(&me->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00378     me->mloopcol = CustomData_get_layer(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00379     me->mloopuv = CustomData_get_layer(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV);
00380 }

00382 /* Note: unlinking is called when me->id.us is 0, question remains how
00383  * much unlinking of Library data in Mesh should be done... probably
00384  * we need a more generic method, like the expand() functions in
00385  * readfile.c */
00386 
00387 void unlink_mesh(Mesh *me)
00388 {
00389     int a;
00390     
00391     if (me==NULL) return;
00392     
00393     for (a=0; a<me->totcol; a++) {
00394         if (me->mat[a]) me->mat[a]->id.us--;
00395         me->mat[a]= NULL;
00396     }
00397 
00398     if (me->key) {
00399         me->key->id.us--;
00400     }
00401     me->key= NULL;
00402     
00403     if (me->texcomesh) me->texcomesh= NULL;
00404 }
00405 
00406 /* do not free mesh itself */
00407 void free_mesh(Mesh *me, int unlink)
00408 {
00409     if (unlink)
00410         unlink_mesh(me);
00411 
00412     CustomData_free(&me->vdata, me->totvert);
00413     CustomData_free(&me->edata, me->totedge);
00414     CustomData_free(&me->fdata, me->totface);
00415     CustomData_free(&me->ldata, me->totloop);
00416     CustomData_free(&me->pdata, me->totpoly);
00417 
00418     if (me->adt) {
00419         BKE_free_animdata(&me->id);
00420         me->adt= NULL;
00421     }
00422     
00423     if (me->mat) MEM_freeN(me->mat);
00424     
00425     if (me->bb) MEM_freeN(me->bb);
00426     if (me->mselect) MEM_freeN(me->mselect);
00427     if (me->edit_btmesh) MEM_freeN(me->edit_btmesh);
00428 }
00429 
00430 void copy_dverts(MDeformVert *dst, MDeformVert *src, int copycount)
00431 {
00432     /* Assumes dst is already set up */
00433     int i;
00434 
00435     if (!src || !dst)
00436         return;
00437 
00438     memcpy (dst, src, copycount * sizeof(MDeformVert));
00439     
00440     for (i=0; i<copycount; i++) {
00441         if (src[i].dw) {
00442             dst[i].dw = MEM_callocN (sizeof(MDeformWeight)*src[i].totweight, "copy_deformWeight");
00443             memcpy (dst[i].dw, src[i].dw, sizeof (MDeformWeight)*src[i].totweight);
00444         }
00445     }
00446 
00447 }
00448 
00449 void free_dverts(MDeformVert *dvert, int totvert)
00450 {
00451     /* Instead of freeing the verts directly,
00452      * call this function to delete any special
00453      * vert data */
00454     int i;
00455 
00456     if (!dvert)
00457         return;
00458 
00459     /* Free any special data from the verts */
00460     for (i=0; i<totvert; i++) {
00461         if (dvert[i].dw) MEM_freeN (dvert[i].dw);
00462     }
00463     MEM_freeN (dvert);
00464 }

00466 static void mesh_tessface_clear_intern(Mesh *mesh, int free_customdata)
00467 {
00468     if (free_customdata)
00469         CustomData_free(&mesh->fdata, mesh->totface);
00470 
00471     mesh->mface = NULL;
00472     mesh->mtface = NULL;
00473     mesh->mcol = NULL;
00474     mesh->totface = 0;
00475 
00476     memset(&mesh->fdata, 0, sizeof(mesh->fdata));
00477 }
00478 
00479 Mesh *add_mesh(const char *name)
00480 {
00481     Mesh *me;
00482     
00483     me= alloc_libblock(&G.main->mesh, ID_ME, name);
00484     
00485     me->size[0]= me->size[1]= me->size[2]= 1.0;
00486     me->smoothresh= 30;
00487     me->texflag= ME_AUTOSPACE;
00488     me->flag= ME_TWOSIDED;
00489     me->bb= unit_boundbox();
00490     me->drawflag= ME_DRAWEDGES|ME_DRAWFACES|ME_DRAWCREASES;
00491     
00492     return me;
00493 }
00494 
00495 Mesh *copy_mesh(Mesh *me)
00496 {
00497     Mesh *men;
00498     MTFace *tface;
00499     MTexPoly *txface;
00500     int a, i;
00501     const int do_tessface = ((me->totface != 0) && (me->totpoly == 0)); /* only do tessface if we have no polys */
00502     
00503     men= copy_libblock(&me->id);
00504     
00505     men->mat= MEM_dupallocN(me->mat);
00506     for (a=0; a<men->totcol; a++) {
00507         id_us_plus((ID *)men->mat[a]);
00508     }
00509     id_us_plus((ID *)men->texcomesh);
00510 
00511     CustomData_copy(&me->vdata, &men->vdata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DUPLICATE, men->totvert);
00512     CustomData_copy(&me->edata, &men->edata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DUPLICATE, men->totedge);
00513     CustomData_copy(&me->ldata, &men->ldata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DUPLICATE, men->totloop);
00514     CustomData_copy(&me->pdata, &men->pdata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DUPLICATE, men->totpoly);
00515     if (do_tessface) {
00516         CustomData_copy(&me->fdata, &men->fdata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DUPLICATE, men->totface);
00517     }
00518     else {
00519         mesh_tessface_clear_intern(men, FALSE);
00520     }
00521 
00522     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(men, do_tessface);
00523 
00524     /* ensure indirect linked data becomes lib-extern */
00525     for (i=0; i<me->fdata.totlayer; i++) {
00526         if (me->fdata.layers[i].type == CD_MTFACE) {
00527             tface= (MTFace*)me->fdata.layers[i].data;
00528 
00529             for (a=0; a<me->totface; a++, tface++)
00530                 if (tface->tpage)
00531                     id_lib_extern((ID*)tface->tpage);
00532         }
00533     }
00534     
00535     for (i=0; i<me->pdata.totlayer; i++) {
00536         if (me->pdata.layers[i].type == CD_MTEXPOLY) {
00537             txface= (MTexPoly*)me->pdata.layers[i].data;
00538 
00539             for (a=0; a<me->totpoly; a++, txface++)
00540                 if (txface->tpage)
00541                     id_lib_extern((ID*)txface->tpage);
00542         }
00543     }
00544 
00545     men->mselect= NULL;
00546     men->edit_btmesh= NULL;
00547 
00548     men->bb= MEM_dupallocN(men->bb);
00549     
00550     men->key= copy_key(me->key);
00551     if (men->key) men->key->from= (ID *)men;
00552 
00553     return men;
00554 }

00556 BMesh *BKE_mesh_to_bmesh(Mesh *me, Object *ob)
00557 {
00558     BMesh *bm;
00559 
00560     bm = BM_mesh_create(&bm_mesh_allocsize_default);
00561 
00562     BM_mesh_bm_from_me(bm, me, TRUE, ob->shapenr);
00563 
00564     return bm;
00565 }
00566 
00567 static void expand_local_mesh(Mesh *me)
00568 {
00569     id_lib_extern((ID *)me->texcomesh);
00570 
00571     if (me->mtface || me->mtpoly) {
00572         int a, i;
00573 
00574         for (i=0; i<me->pdata.totlayer; i++) {
00575             if (me->pdata.layers[i].type == CD_MTEXPOLY) {
00576                 MTexPoly *txface= (MTexPoly*)me->fdata.layers[i].data;
00577 
00578                 for (a=0; a<me->totpoly; a++, txface++) {
00579                     /* special case: ima always local immediately */
00580                     if (txface->tpage) {
00581                         id_lib_extern((ID *)txface->tpage);
00582                     }
00583                 }
00584             }
00585         }
00586 
00587         for (i=0; i<me->fdata.totlayer; i++) {
00588             if (me->fdata.layers[i].type == CD_MTFACE) {
00589                 MTFace *tface= (MTFace*)me->fdata.layers[i].data;
00590 
00591                 for (a=0; a<me->totface; a++, tface++) {
00592                     /* special case: ima always local immediately */
00593                     if (tface->tpage) {
00594                         id_lib_extern((ID *)tface->tpage);
00595                     }
00596                 }
00597             }
00598         }
00599     }
00600 
00601     if (me->mat) {
00602         extern_local_matarar(me->mat, me->totcol);
00603     }
00604 }
00605 
00606 void make_local_mesh(Mesh *me)
00607 {
00608     Main *bmain= G.main;
00609     Object *ob;
00610     int is_local= FALSE, is_lib= FALSE;
00611 
00612     /* - only lib users: do nothing
00613      * - only local users: set flag
00614      * - mixed: make copy
00615      */
00616 
00617     if (me->id.lib==NULL) return;
00618     if (me->id.us==1) {
00619         id_clear_lib_data(bmain, &me->id);
00620         expand_local_mesh(me);
00621         return;
00622     }
00623 
00624     for (ob= bmain->object.first; ob && ELEM(0, is_lib, is_local); ob= ob->id.next) {
00625         if (me == ob->data) {
00626             if (ob->id.lib) is_lib= TRUE;
00627             else is_local= TRUE;
00628         }
00629     }
00630 
00631     if (is_local && is_lib == FALSE) {
00632         id_clear_lib_data(bmain, &me->id);
00633         expand_local_mesh(me);
00634     }
00635     else if (is_local && is_lib) {
00636         Mesh *me_new= copy_mesh(me);
00637         me_new->id.us= 0;
00638 
00639 
00640         /* Remap paths of new ID using old library as base. */
00641         BKE_id_lib_local_paths(bmain, me->id.lib, &me_new->id);
00642 
00643         for (ob= bmain->object.first; ob; ob= ob->id.next) {
00644             if (me == ob->data) {
00645                 if (ob->id.lib==NULL) {
00646                     set_mesh(ob, me_new);
00647                 }
00648             }
00649         }
00650     }
00651 }
00652 
00653 void boundbox_mesh(Mesh *me, float *loc, float *size)
00654 {
00655     BoundBox *bb;
00656     float min[3], max[3];
00657     float mloc[3], msize[3];
00658     
00659     if (me->bb==NULL) me->bb= MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoundBox), "boundbox");
00660     bb= me->bb;
00661 
00662     if (!loc) loc= mloc;
00663     if (!size) size= msize;
00664     
00665     INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
00666     if (!minmax_mesh(me, min, max)) {
00667         min[0] = min[1] = min[2] = -1.0f;
00668         max[0] = max[1] = max[2] = 1.0f;
00669     }
00670 
00671     mid_v3_v3v3(loc, min, max);
00672         
00673     size[0]= (max[0]-min[0])/2.0f;
00674     size[1]= (max[1]-min[1])/2.0f;
00675     size[2]= (max[2]-min[2])/2.0f;
00676     
00677     boundbox_set_from_min_max(bb, min, max);
00678 }
00679 
00680 void tex_space_mesh(Mesh *me)
00681 {
00682     float loc[3], size[3];
00683     int a;
00684 
00685     boundbox_mesh(me, loc, size);
00686 
00687     if (me->texflag & ME_AUTOSPACE) {
00688         for (a=0; a<3; a++) {
00689             if (size[a]==0.0f) size[a]= 1.0f;
00690             else if (size[a]>0.0f && size[a]<0.00001f) size[a]= 0.00001f;
00691             else if (size[a]<0.0f && size[a]> -0.00001f) size[a]= -0.00001f;
00692         }
00693 
00694         copy_v3_v3(me->loc, loc);
00695         copy_v3_v3(me->size, size);
00696         zero_v3(me->rot);
00697     }
00698 }
00699 
00700 BoundBox *mesh_get_bb(Object *ob)
00701 {
00702     Mesh *me= ob->data;
00703 
00704     if (ob->bb)
00705         return ob->bb;
00706 
00707     if (!me->bb)
00708         tex_space_mesh(me);
00709 
00710     return me->bb;
00711 }
00712 
00713 void mesh_get_texspace(Mesh *me, float r_loc[3], float r_rot[3], float r_size[3])
00714 {
00715     if (!me->bb) {
00716         tex_space_mesh(me);
00717     }
00718 
00719     if (r_loc)  copy_v3_v3(r_loc,  me->loc);
00720     if (r_rot)  copy_v3_v3(r_rot,  me->rot);
00721     if (r_size) copy_v3_v3(r_size, me->size);
00722 }
00723 
00724 float *get_mesh_orco_verts(Object *ob)
00725 {
00726     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00727     MVert *mvert = NULL;
00728     Mesh *tme = me->texcomesh?me->texcomesh:me;
00729     int a, totvert;
00730     float (*vcos)[3] = NULL;
00731 
00732     /* Get appropriate vertex coordinates */
00733     vcos = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*vcos)*me->totvert, "orco mesh");
00734     mvert = tme->mvert;
00735     totvert = MIN2(tme->totvert, me->totvert);
00736 
00737     for (a=0; a<totvert; a++, mvert++) {
00738         copy_v3_v3(vcos[a], mvert->co);
00739     }
00740 
00741     return (float*)vcos;
00742 }
00743 
00744 void transform_mesh_orco_verts(Mesh *me, float (*orco)[3], int totvert, int invert)
00745 {
00746     float loc[3], size[3];
00747     int a;
00748 
00749     mesh_get_texspace(me->texcomesh?me->texcomesh:me, loc, NULL, size);
00750 
00751     if (invert) {
00752         for (a=0; a<totvert; a++) {
00753             float *co = orco[a];
00754             madd_v3_v3v3v3(co, loc, co, size);
00755         }
00756     }
00757     else {
00758         for (a=0; a<totvert; a++) {
00759             float *co = orco[a];
00760             co[0] = (co[0]-loc[0])/size[0];
00761             co[1] = (co[1]-loc[1])/size[1];
00762             co[2] = (co[2]-loc[2])/size[2];
00763         }
00764     }
00765 }
00766 
00767 /* rotates the vertices of a face in case v[2] or v[3] (vertex index) is = 0.
00768  * this is necessary to make the if (mface->v4) check for quads work */
00769 int test_index_face(MFace *mface, CustomData *fdata, int mfindex, int nr)
00770 {
00771     /* first test if the face is legal */
00772     if ((mface->v3 || nr==4) && mface->v3==mface->v4) {
00773         mface->v4= 0;
00774         nr--;
00775     }
00776     if ((mface->v2 || mface->v4) && mface->v2==mface->v3) {
00777         mface->v3= mface->v4;
00778         mface->v4= 0;
00779         nr--;
00780     }
00781     if (mface->v1==mface->v2) {
00782         mface->v2= mface->v3;
00783         mface->v3= mface->v4;
00784         mface->v4= 0;
00785         nr--;
00786     }
00787 
00788     /* check corrupt cases, bowtie geometry, cant handle these because edge data wont exist so just return 0 */
00789     if (nr==3) {
00790         if (
00791         /* real edges */
00792             mface->v1==mface->v2 ||
00793             mface->v2==mface->v3 ||
00794             mface->v3==mface->v1
00795         ) {
00796             return 0;
00797         }
00798     }
00799     else if (nr==4) {
00800         if (
00801         /* real edges */
00802             mface->v1==mface->v2 ||
00803             mface->v2==mface->v3 ||
00804             mface->v3==mface->v4 ||
00805             mface->v4==mface->v1 ||
00806         /* across the face */
00807             mface->v1==mface->v3 ||
00808             mface->v2==mface->v4
00809         ) {
00810             return 0;
00811         }
00812     }
00813 
00814     /* prevent a zero at wrong index location */
00815     if (nr==3) {
00816         if (mface->v3==0) {
00817             static int corner_indices[4] = {1, 2, 0, 3};
00818 
00819             SWAP(unsigned int, mface->v1, mface->v2);
00820             SWAP(unsigned int, mface->v2, mface->v3);
00821 
00822             if (fdata)
00823                 CustomData_swap(fdata, mfindex, corner_indices);
00824         }
00825     }
00826     else if (nr==4) {
00827         if (mface->v3==0 || mface->v4==0) {
00828             static int corner_indices[4] = {2, 3, 0, 1};
00829 
00830             SWAP(unsigned int, mface->v1, mface->v3);
00831             SWAP(unsigned int, mface->v2, mface->v4);
00832 
00833             if (fdata)
00834                 CustomData_swap(fdata, mfindex, corner_indices);
00835         }
00836     }
00837 
00838     return nr;
00839 }
00840 
00841 Mesh *get_mesh(Object *ob)
00842 {
00843     
00844     if (ob==NULL) return NULL;
00845     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) return ob->data;
00846     else return NULL;
00847 }
00848 
00849 void set_mesh(Object *ob, Mesh *me)
00850 {
00851     Mesh *old=NULL;
00852 
00853     multires_force_update(ob);
00854     
00855     if (ob==NULL) return;
00856     
00857     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00858         old= ob->data;
00859         if (old)
00860             old->id.us--;
00861         ob->data= me;
00862         id_us_plus((ID *)me);
00863     }
00864     
00865     test_object_materials((ID *)me);
00866 
00867     test_object_modifiers(ob);
00868 }
00869 
00870 /* ************** make edges in a Mesh, for outside of editmode */
00871 
00872 struct edgesort {
00873     unsigned int v1, v2;
00874     short is_loose, is_draw;
00875 };
00876 
00877 /* edges have to be added with lowest index first for sorting */
00878 static void to_edgesort(struct edgesort *ed,
00879                         unsigned int v1, unsigned int v2,
00880                         short is_loose, short is_draw)
00881 {
00882     if (v1<v2) {
00883         ed->v1= v1; ed->v2= v2;
00884     }
00885     else {
00886         ed->v1= v2; ed->v2= v1;
00887     }
00888     ed->is_loose= is_loose;
00889     ed->is_draw= is_draw;
00890 }
00891 
00892 static int vergedgesort(const void *v1, const void *v2)
00893 {
00894     const struct edgesort *x1=v1, *x2=v2;
00895 
00896     if ( x1->v1 > x2->v1) return 1;
00897     else if ( x1->v1 < x2->v1) return -1;
00898     else if ( x1->v2 > x2->v2) return 1;
00899     else if ( x1->v2 < x2->v2) return -1;
00900     
00901     return 0;
00902 }
00903 
00904 
00905 /* Create edges based on known verts and faces */
00906 static void make_edges_mdata(MVert *UNUSED(allvert), MFace *allface, MLoop *allloop,
00907     MPoly *allpoly, int UNUSED(totvert), int totface, int UNUSED(totloop), int totpoly,
00908     int old, MEdge **alledge, int *_totedge)
00909 {
00910     MPoly *mpoly;
00911     MLoop *mloop;
00912     MFace *mface;
00913     MEdge *medge;
00914     EdgeHash *hash = BLI_edgehash_new();
00915     struct edgesort *edsort, *ed;
00916     int a, b, totedge=0, final=0;
00917 
00918     /* we put all edges in array, sort them, and detect doubles that way */
00919 
00920     for (a= totface, mface= allface; a>0; a--, mface++) {
00921         if (mface->v4) totedge+=4;
00922         else if (mface->v3) totedge+=3;
00923         else totedge+=1;
00924     }
00925 
00926     if (totedge==0) {
00927         /* flag that mesh has edges */
00928         (*alledge)= MEM_callocN(0, "make mesh edges");
00929         (*_totedge) = 0;
00930         return;
00931     }
00932 
00933     ed= edsort= MEM_mallocN(totedge*sizeof(struct edgesort), "edgesort");
00934 
00935     for (a= totface, mface= allface; a>0; a--, mface++) {
00936         to_edgesort(ed++, mface->v1, mface->v2, !mface->v3, mface->edcode & ME_V1V2);
00937         if (mface->v4) {
00938             to_edgesort(ed++, mface->v2, mface->v3, 0, mface->edcode & ME_V2V3);
00939             to_edgesort(ed++, mface->v3, mface->v4, 0, mface->edcode & ME_V3V4);
00940             to_edgesort(ed++, mface->v4, mface->v1, 0, mface->edcode & ME_V4V1);
00941         }
00942         else if (mface->v3) {
00943             to_edgesort(ed++, mface->v2, mface->v3, 0, mface->edcode & ME_V2V3);
00944             to_edgesort(ed++, mface->v3, mface->v1, 0, mface->edcode & ME_V3V1);
00945         }
00946     }
00947 
00948     qsort(edsort, totedge, sizeof(struct edgesort), vergedgesort);
00949 
00950     /* count final amount */
00951     for (a=totedge, ed=edsort; a>1; a--, ed++) {
00952         /* edge is unique when it differs from next edge, or is last */
00953         if (ed->v1 != (ed+1)->v1 || ed->v2 != (ed+1)->v2) final++;
00954     }
00955     final++;
00956 
00957     (*alledge)= medge= MEM_callocN(sizeof (MEdge) * final, "make_edges mdge");
00958     (*_totedge)= final;
00959 
00960     for (a=totedge, ed=edsort; a>1; a--, ed++) {
00961         /* edge is unique when it differs from next edge, or is last */
00962         if (ed->v1 != (ed+1)->v1 || ed->v2 != (ed+1)->v2) {
00963             medge->v1= ed->v1;
00964             medge->v2= ed->v2;
00965             if (old==0 || ed->is_draw) medge->flag= ME_EDGEDRAW|ME_EDGERENDER;
00966             if (ed->is_loose) medge->flag|= ME_LOOSEEDGE;
00967 
00968             /* order is swapped so extruding this edge as a surface wont flip face normals
00969              * with cyclic curves */
00970             if (ed->v1+1 != ed->v2) {
00971                 SWAP(unsigned int, medge->v1, medge->v2);
00972             }
00973             medge++;
00974         }
00975         else {
00976             /* equal edge, we merge the drawflag */
00977             (ed+1)->is_draw |= ed->is_draw;
00978         }
00979     }
00980     /* last edge */
00981     medge->v1= ed->v1;
00982     medge->v2= ed->v2;
00983     medge->flag= ME_EDGEDRAW;
00984     if (ed->is_loose) medge->flag|= ME_LOOSEEDGE;
00985     medge->flag |= ME_EDGERENDER;
00986 
00987     MEM_freeN(edsort);
00988     
00989     /*set edge members of mloops*/
00990     medge= *alledge;
00991     for (a=0; a<*_totedge; a++, medge++) {
00992         BLI_edgehash_insert(hash, medge->v1, medge->v2, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(a));
00993     }
00994     
00995     mpoly = allpoly;
00996     for (a=0; a<totpoly; a++, mpoly++) {
00997         mloop = allloop + mpoly->loopstart;
00998         for (b=0; b<mpoly->totloop; b++) {
00999             int v1, v2;
01000             
01001             v1 = mloop[b].v;
01002             v2 = ME_POLY_LOOP_NEXT(mloop, mpoly, b)->v;
01003             mloop[b].e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(hash, v1, v2));
01004         }
01005     }
01006     
01007     BLI_edgehash_free(hash, NULL);
01008 }
01009 
01010 void make_edges(Mesh *me, int old)
01011 {
01012     MEdge *medge;
01013     int totedge=0;
01014 
01015     make_edges_mdata(me->mvert, me->mface, me->mloop, me->mpoly, me->totvert, me->totface, me->totloop, me->totpoly, old, &medge, &totedge);
01016     if (totedge==0) {
01017         /* flag that mesh has edges */
01018         me->medge = medge;
01019         me->totedge = 0;
01020         return;
01021     }
01022 
01023     medge= CustomData_add_layer(&me->edata, CD_MEDGE, CD_ASSIGN, medge, totedge);
01024     me->medge= medge;
01025     me->totedge= totedge;
01026 
01027     mesh_strip_loose_faces(me);
01028 }
01029 
01030 /* We need to keep this for edge creation (for now?), and some old readfile code... */
01031 void mesh_strip_loose_faces(Mesh *me)
01032 {
01033     MFace *f;
01034     int a, b;
01035 
01036     for (a = b = 0, f = me->mface; a < me->totface; a++, f++) {
01037         if (f->v3) {
01038             if (a != b) {
01039                 memcpy(&me->mface[b], f, sizeof(me->mface[b]));
01040                 CustomData_copy_data(&me->fdata, &me->fdata, a, b, 1);
01041             }
01042             b++;
01043         }
01044     }
01045     if (a != b) {
01046         CustomData_free_elem(&me->fdata, b, a - b);
01047         me->totface = b;
01048     }
01049 }
01050 
01051 /* Works on both loops and polys! */
01052 /* Note: It won't try to guess which loops of an invalid poly to remove!
01053  *       this is the work of the caller, to mark those loops...
01054  *       See e.g. BKE_mesh_validate_arrays(). */
01055 void mesh_strip_loose_polysloops(Mesh *me)
01056 {
01057     MPoly *p;
01058     MLoop *l;
01059     int a, b;
01060     /* New loops idx! */
01061     int *new_idx = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * me->totloop, __func__);
01062 
01063     for (a = b = 0, p = me->mpoly; a < me->totpoly; a++, p++) {
01064         int invalid = FALSE;
01065         int i = p->loopstart;
01066         int stop = i + p->totloop;
01067 
01068         if (stop > me->totloop || stop < i) {
01069             invalid = TRUE;
01070         }
01071         else {
01072             l = &me->mloop[i];
01073             i = stop - i;
01074             /* If one of the poly's loops is invalid, the whole poly is invalid! */
01075             for (; i--; l++) {
01076                 if (l->e == INVALID_LOOP_EDGE_MARKER) {
01077                     invalid = TRUE;
01078                     break;
01079                 }
01080             }
01081         }
01082 
01083         if (p->totloop >= 3 && !invalid) {
01084             if (a != b) {
01085                 memcpy(&me->mpoly[b], p, sizeof(me->mpoly[b]));
01086                 CustomData_copy_data(&me->pdata, &me->pdata, a, b, 1);
01087             }
01088             b++;
01089         }
01090     }
01091     if (a != b) {
01092         CustomData_free_elem(&me->pdata, b, a - b);
01093         me->totpoly = b;
01094     }
01095 
01096     /* And now, get rid of invalid loops. */
01097     for (a = b = 0, l = me->mloop; a < me->totloop; a++, l++) {
01098         if (l->e != INVALID_LOOP_EDGE_MARKER) {
01099             if (a != b) {
01100                 memcpy(&me->mloop[b], l, sizeof(me->mloop[b]));
01101                 CustomData_copy_data(&me->ldata, &me->ldata, a, b, 1);
01102             }
01103             new_idx[a] = b;
01104             b++;
01105         }
01106         else {
01107             /* XXX Theoretically, we should be able to not do this, as no remaining poly
01108              *     should use any stripped loop. But for security's sake... */
01109             new_idx[a] = -a;
01110         }
01111     }
01112     if (a != b) {
01113         CustomData_free_elem(&me->ldata, b, a - b);
01114         me->totloop = b;
01115     }
01116 
01117     /* And now, update polys' start loop index. */
01118     /* Note: At this point, there should never be any poly using a striped loop! */
01119     for (a = 0, p = me->mpoly; a < me->totpoly; a++, p++) {
01120         p->loopstart = new_idx[p->loopstart];
01121     }
01122 
01123     MEM_freeN(new_idx);
01124 }
01125 
01126 void mesh_strip_loose_edges(Mesh *me)
01127 {
01128     MEdge *e;
01129     MLoop *l;
01130     int a, b;
01131     unsigned int *new_idx = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * me->totedge, __func__);
01132 
01133     for (a = b = 0, e = me->medge; a < me->totedge; a++, e++) {
01134         if (e->v1 != e->v2) {
01135             if (a != b) {
01136                 memcpy(&me->medge[b], e, sizeof(me->medge[b]));
01137                 CustomData_copy_data(&me->edata, &me->edata, a, b, 1);
01138             }
01139             new_idx[a] = b;
01140             b++;
01141         }
01142         else {
01143             new_idx[a] = INVALID_LOOP_EDGE_MARKER;
01144         }
01145     }
01146     if (a != b) {
01147         CustomData_free_elem(&me->edata, b, a - b);
01148         me->totedge = b;
01149     }
01150 
01151     /* And now, update loops' edge indices. */
01152     /* XXX We hope no loop was pointing to a striped edge!
01153      *     Else, its e will be set to INVALID_LOOP_EDGE_MARKER :/ */
01154     for (a = 0, l = me->mloop; a < me->totloop; a++, l++) {
01155         l->e = new_idx[l->e];
01156     }
01157 
01158     MEM_freeN(new_idx);
01159 }
01160 
01161 void mball_to_mesh(ListBase *lb, Mesh *me)
01162 {
01163     DispList *dl;
01164     MVert *mvert;
01165     MLoop *mloop, *allloop;
01166     MPoly *mpoly;
01167     float *nors, *verts;
01168     int a, *index;
01169     
01170     dl= lb->first;
01171     if (dl==NULL) return;
01172 
01173     if (dl->type==DL_INDEX4) {
01174         mvert= CustomData_add_layer(&me->vdata, CD_MVERT, CD_CALLOC, NULL, dl->nr);
01175         allloop= mloop= CustomData_add_layer(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOP, CD_CALLOC, NULL, dl->parts * 4);
01176         mpoly= CustomData_add_layer(&me->pdata, CD_MPOLY, CD_CALLOC, NULL, dl->parts);
01177         me->mvert= mvert;
01178         me->mloop= mloop;
01179         me->mpoly= mpoly;
01180         me->totvert= dl->nr;
01181         me->totpoly= dl->parts;
01182 
01183         a= dl->nr;
01184         nors= dl->nors;
01185         verts= dl->verts;
01186         while (a--) {
01187             copy_v3_v3(mvert->co, verts);
01188             normal_float_to_short_v3(mvert->no, nors);
01189             mvert++;
01190             nors+= 3;
01191             verts+= 3;
01192         }
01193         
01194         a= dl->parts;
01195         index= dl->index;
01196         while (a--) {
01197             int count= index[2] != index[3] ? 4 : 3;
01198 
01199             mloop[0].v= index[0];
01200             mloop[1].v= index[1];
01201             mloop[2].v= index[2];
01202             if (count == 4)
01203                 mloop[3].v= index[3];
01204 
01205             mpoly->totloop= count;
01206             mpoly->loopstart= (int)(mloop - allloop);
01207             mpoly->flag= ME_SMOOTH;
01208 
01209 
01210             mpoly++;
01211             mloop+= count;
01212             me->totloop+= count;
01213             index+= 4;
01214         }
01215 
01216         mesh_update_customdata_pointers(me, TRUE);
01217 
01218         mesh_calc_normals(me->mvert, me->totvert, me->mloop, me->mpoly, me->totloop, me->totpoly, NULL);
01219 
01220         BKE_mesh_calc_edges(me, TRUE);
01221     }
01222 }
01223 
01224 /* Initialize mverts, medges and, faces for converting nurbs to mesh and derived mesh */
01225 /* return non-zero on error */
01226 int nurbs_to_mdata(Object *ob, MVert **allvert, int *totvert,
01227     MEdge **alledge, int *totedge, MLoop **allloop, MPoly **allpoly,
01228     int *totloop, int *totpoly)
01229 {
01230     return nurbs_to_mdata_customdb(ob, &ob->disp,
01231                                    allvert, totvert,
01232                                    alledge, totedge,
01233                                    allloop, allpoly,
01234                                    totloop, totpoly);
01235 }
01236 
01237 /* BMESH: this doesn't calculate all edges from polygons,
01238  * only free standing edges are calculated */
01239 
01240 /* Initialize mverts, medges and, faces for converting nurbs to mesh and derived mesh */
01241 /* use specified dispbase  */
01242 int nurbs_to_mdata_customdb(Object *ob, ListBase *dispbase,
01243                             MVert **allvert, int *_totvert,
01244                             MEdge **alledge, int *_totedge,
01245                             MLoop **allloop, MPoly **allpoly,
01246                             int *_totloop, int *_totpoly)
01247 {
01248     DispList *dl;
01249     Curve *cu;
01250     MVert *mvert;
01251     MPoly *mpoly;
01252     MLoop *mloop;
01253     MEdge *medge;
01254     float *data;
01255     int a, b, ofs, vertcount, startvert, totvert=0, totedge=0, totloop=0, totvlak=0;
01256     int p1, p2, p3, p4, *index;
01257     int conv_polys= 0;
01258 
01259     cu= ob->data;
01260 
01261     conv_polys|= cu->flag & CU_3D;      /* 2d polys are filled with DL_INDEX3 displists */
01262     conv_polys|= ob->type == OB_SURF;   /* surf polys are never filled */
01263 
01264     /* count */
01265     dl= dispbase->first;
01266     while (dl) {
01267         if (dl->type==DL_SEGM) {
01268             totvert+= dl->parts*dl->nr;
01269             totedge+= dl->parts*(dl->nr-1);
01270         }
01271         else if (dl->type==DL_POLY) {
01272             if (conv_polys) {
01273                 totvert+= dl->parts*dl->nr;
01274                 totedge+= dl->parts*dl->nr;
01275             }
01276         }
01277         else if (dl->type==DL_SURF) {
01278             int tot;
01279             totvert+= dl->parts*dl->nr;
01280             tot = (dl->parts-1+((dl->flag & DL_CYCL_V)==2))*(dl->nr-1+(dl->flag & DL_CYCL_U));
01281             totvlak += tot;
01282             totloop += tot * 4;
01283         }
01284         else if (dl->type==DL_INDEX3) {
01285             int tot;
01286             totvert+= dl->nr;
01287             tot = dl->parts;
01288             totvlak+= tot;
01289             totloop += tot * 3;
01290         }
01291         dl= dl->next;
01292     }
01293 
01294     if (totvert==0) {
01295         /* error("can't convert"); */
01296         /* Make Sure you check ob->data is a curve */
01297         return -1;
01298     }
01299 
01300     *allvert = mvert = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MVert) * totvert, "nurbs_init mvert");
01301     *alledge = medge = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MEdge) * totedge, "nurbs_init medge");
01302     *allloop = mloop = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MLoop) * totvlak * 4, "nurbs_init mloop"); // totloop
01303     *allpoly = mpoly = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MPoly) * totvlak, "nurbs_init mloop");
01304     
01305     /* verts and faces */
01306     vertcount= 0;
01307 
01308     dl= dispbase->first;
01309     while (dl) {
01310         int smooth= dl->rt & CU_SMOOTH ? 1 : 0;
01311 
01312         if (dl->type==DL_SEGM) {
01313             startvert= vertcount;
01314             a= dl->parts*dl->nr;
01315             data= dl->verts;
01316             while (a--) {
01317                 copy_v3_v3(mvert->co, data);
01318                 data+=3;
01319                 vertcount++;
01320                 mvert++;
01321             }
01322 
01323             for (a=0; a<dl->parts; a++) {
01324                 ofs= a*dl->nr;
01325                 for (b=1; b<dl->nr; b++) {
01326                     medge->v1= startvert+ofs+b-1;
01327                     medge->v2= startvert+ofs+b;
01328                     medge->flag = ME_LOOSEEDGE | ME_EDGERENDER | ME_EDGEDRAW;
01329 
01330                     medge++;
01331                 }
01332             }
01333 
01334         }
01335         else if (dl->type==DL_POLY) {
01336             if (conv_polys) {
01337                 startvert= vertcount;
01338                 a= dl->parts*dl->nr;
01339                 data= dl->verts;
01340                 while (a--) {
01341                     copy_v3_v3(mvert->co, data);
01342                     data+=3;
01343                     vertcount++;
01344                     mvert++;
01345                 }
01346 
01347                 for (a=0; a<dl->parts; a++) {
01348                     ofs= a*dl->nr;
01349                     for (b=0; b<dl->nr; b++) {
01350                         medge->v1= startvert+ofs+b;
01351                         if (b==dl->nr-1) medge->v2= startvert+ofs;
01352                         else medge->v2= startvert+ofs+b+1;
01353                         medge->flag = ME_LOOSEEDGE | ME_EDGERENDER | ME_EDGEDRAW;
01354                         medge++;
01355                     }
01356                 }
01357             }
01358         }
01359         else if (dl->type==DL_INDEX3) {
01360             startvert= vertcount;
01361             a= dl->nr;
01362             data= dl->verts;
01363             while (a--) {
01364                 copy_v3_v3(mvert->co, data);
01365                 data+=3;
01366                 vertcount++;
01367                 mvert++;
01368             }
01369 
01370             a= dl->parts;
01371             index= dl->index;
01372             while (a--) {
01373                 mloop[0].v = startvert+index[0];
01374                 mloop[1].v = startvert+index[2];
01375                 mloop[2].v = startvert+index[1];
01376                 mpoly->loopstart = (int)(mloop - (*allloop));
01377                 mpoly->totloop = 3;
01378                 mpoly->mat_nr = dl->col;
01379 
01380                 if (smooth) mpoly->flag |= ME_SMOOTH;
01381                 mpoly++;
01382                 mloop+= 3;
01383                 index+= 3;
01384             }
01385 
01386 
01387         }
01388         else if (dl->type==DL_SURF) {
01389             startvert= vertcount;
01390             a= dl->parts*dl->nr;
01391             data= dl->verts;
01392             while (a--) {
01393                 copy_v3_v3(mvert->co, data);
01394                 data+=3;
01395                 vertcount++;
01396                 mvert++;
01397             }
01398 
01399             for (a=0; a<dl->parts; a++) {
01400 
01401                 if ( (dl->flag & DL_CYCL_V)==0 && a==dl->parts-1) break;
01402 
01403                 if (dl->flag & DL_CYCL_U) {         /* p2 -> p1 -> */
01404                     p1= startvert+ dl->nr*a;    /* p4 -> p3 -> */
01405                     p2= p1+ dl->nr-1;       /* -----> next row */
01406                     p3= p1+ dl->nr;
01407                     p4= p2+ dl->nr;
01408                     b= 0;
01409                 }
01410                 else {
01411                     p2= startvert+ dl->nr*a;
01412                     p1= p2+1;
01413                     p4= p2+ dl->nr;
01414                     p3= p1+ dl->nr;
01415                     b= 1;
01416                 }
01417                 if ( (dl->flag & DL_CYCL_V) && a==dl->parts-1) {
01418                     p3-= dl->parts*dl->nr;
01419                     p4-= dl->parts*dl->nr;
01420                 }
01421 
01422                 for (; b<dl->nr; b++) {
01423                     mloop[0].v= p1;
01424                     mloop[1].v= p3;
01425                     mloop[2].v= p4;
01426                     mloop[3].v= p2;
01427                     mpoly->loopstart = (int)(mloop - (*allloop));
01428                     mpoly->totloop = 4;
01429                     mpoly->mat_nr = dl->col;
01430 
01431                     if (smooth) mpoly->flag |= ME_SMOOTH;
01432                     mpoly++;
01433                     mloop+= 4;
01434 
01435                     p4= p3;
01436                     p3++;
01437                     p2= p1;
01438                     p1++;
01439                 }
01440             }
01441 
01442         }
01443 
01444         dl= dl->next;
01445     }
01446     
01447     *_totpoly= totvlak;
01448     *_totloop= totloop;
01449     *_totedge= totedge;
01450     *_totvert= totvert;
01451 
01452     /* not uded for bmesh */
01453 #if 0
01454     make_edges_mdata(*allvert, *allface, *allloop, *allpoly, totvert, totvlak, *_totloop, *_totpoly, 0, alledge, _totedge);
01455     mfaces_strip_loose(*allface, _totface);
01456 #endif
01457 
01458     return 0;
01459 }
01460 
01461 /* this may fail replacing ob->data, be sure to check ob->type */
01462 void nurbs_to_mesh(Object *ob)
01463 {
01464     Main *bmain= G.main;
01465     Object *ob1;
01466     DerivedMesh *dm= ob->derivedFinal;
01467     Mesh *me;
01468     Curve *cu;
01469     MVert *allvert= NULL;
01470     MEdge *alledge= NULL;
01471     MLoop *allloop = NULL;
01472     MPoly *allpoly = NULL;
01473     int totvert, totedge, totloop, totpoly;
01474 
01475     cu= ob->data;
01476 
01477     if (dm == NULL) {
01478         if (nurbs_to_mdata(ob, &allvert, &totvert, &alledge, &totedge, &allloop, &allpoly, &totloop, &totpoly) != 0) {
01479             /* Error initializing */
01480             return;
01481         }
01482 
01483         /* make mesh */
01484         me= add_mesh("Mesh");
01485         me->totvert= totvert;
01486         me->totedge= totedge;
01487         me->totloop = totloop;
01488         me->totpoly = totpoly;
01489 
01490         me->mvert= CustomData_add_layer(&me->vdata, CD_MVERT, CD_ASSIGN, allvert, me->totvert);
01491         me->medge= CustomData_add_layer(&me->edata, CD_MEDGE, CD_ASSIGN, alledge, me->totedge);
01492         me->mloop= CustomData_add_layer(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOP, CD_ASSIGN, allloop, me->totloop);
01493         me->mpoly= CustomData_add_layer(&me->pdata, CD_MPOLY, CD_ASSIGN, allpoly, me->totpoly);
01494 
01495         mesh_calc_normals(me->mvert, me->totvert, me->mloop, me->mpoly, me->totloop, me->totpoly, NULL);
01496 
01497         BKE_mesh_calc_edges(me, TRUE);
01498     }
01499     else {
01500         me= add_mesh("Mesh");
01501         DM_to_mesh(dm, me, ob);
01502     }
01503 
01504     me->totcol= cu->totcol;
01505     me->mat= cu->mat;
01506 
01507     tex_space_mesh(me);
01508 
01509     cu->mat= NULL;
01510     cu->totcol= 0;
01511 
01512     if (ob->data) {
01513         free_libblock(&bmain->curve, ob->data);
01514     }
01515     ob->data= me;
01516     ob->type= OB_MESH;
01517 
01518     /* other users */
01519     ob1= bmain->object.first;
01520     while (ob1) {
01521         if (ob1->data==cu) {
01522             ob1->type= OB_MESH;
01523         
01524             ob1->data= ob->data;
01525             id_us_plus((ID *)ob->data);
01526         }
01527         ob1= ob1->id.next;
01528     }
01529 }
01530 
01531 typedef struct EdgeLink {
01532     Link *next, *prev;
01533     void *edge;
01534 } EdgeLink;
01535 
01536 typedef struct VertLink {
01537     Link *next, *prev;
01538     unsigned int index;
01539 } VertLink;
01540 
01541 static void prependPolyLineVert(ListBase *lb, unsigned int index)
01542 {
01543     VertLink *vl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(VertLink), "VertLink");
01544     vl->index = index;
01545     BLI_addhead(lb, vl);
01546 }
01547 
01548 static void appendPolyLineVert(ListBase *lb, unsigned int index)
01549 {
01550     VertLink *vl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(VertLink), "VertLink");
01551     vl->index = index;
01552     BLI_addtail(lb, vl);
01553 }
01554 
01555 void mesh_to_curve(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
01556 {
01557     /* make new mesh data from the original copy */
01558     DerivedMesh *dm= mesh_get_derived_final(scene, ob, CD_MASK_MESH);
01559 
01560     MVert *mverts= dm->getVertArray(dm);
01561     MEdge *med, *medge= dm->getEdgeArray(dm);
01562     MFace *mf,  *mface= dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
01563 
01564     int totedge = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
01565     int totface = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
01566     int totedges = 0;
01567     int i, needsFree = 0;
01568 
01569     /* only to detect edge polylines */
01570     EdgeHash *eh = BLI_edgehash_new();
01571     EdgeHash *eh_edge = BLI_edgehash_new();
01572 
01573 
01574     ListBase edges = {NULL, NULL};
01575 
01576     /* create edges from all faces (so as to find edges not in any faces) */
01577     mf= mface;
01578     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++, mf++) {
01579         if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v1, mf->v2))
01580             BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v1, mf->v2, NULL);
01581         if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v2, mf->v3))
01582             BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v2, mf->v3, NULL);
01583 
01584         if (mf->v4) {
01585             if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v3, mf->v4))
01586                 BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v3, mf->v4, NULL);
01587             if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v4, mf->v1))
01588                 BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v4, mf->v1, NULL);
01589         }
01590         else {
01591             if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v3, mf->v1))
01592                 BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v3, mf->v1, NULL);
01593         }
01594     }
01595 
01596     med= medge;
01597     for (i=0; i<totedge; i++, med++) {
01598         if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, med->v1, med->v2)) {
01599             EdgeLink *edl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(EdgeLink), "EdgeLink");
01600 
01601             BLI_edgehash_insert(eh_edge, med->v1, med->v2, NULL);
01602             edl->edge= med;
01603 
01604             BLI_addtail(&edges, edl);   totedges++;
01605         }
01606     }
01607     BLI_edgehash_free(eh_edge, NULL);
01608     BLI_edgehash_free(eh, NULL);
01609 
01610     if (edges.first) {
01611         Curve *cu = add_curve(ob->id.name+2, OB_CURVE);
01612         cu->flag |= CU_3D;
01613 
01614         while (edges.first) {
01615             /* each iteration find a polyline and add this as a nurbs poly spline */
01616 
01617             ListBase polyline = {NULL, NULL}; /* store a list of VertLink's */
01618             int closed = FALSE;
01619             int totpoly= 0;
01620             MEdge *med_current= ((EdgeLink *)edges.last)->edge;
01621             unsigned int startVert= med_current->v1;
01622             unsigned int endVert= med_current->v2;
01623             int ok= TRUE;
01624 
01625             appendPolyLineVert(&polyline, startVert);   totpoly++;
01626             appendPolyLineVert(&polyline, endVert);     totpoly++;
01627             BLI_freelinkN(&edges, edges.last);          totedges--;
01628 
01629             while (ok) { /* while connected edges are found... */
01630                 ok = FALSE;
01631                 i= totedges;
01632                 while (i) {
01633                     EdgeLink *edl;
01634 
01635                     i-=1;
01636                     edl= BLI_findlink(&edges, i);
01637                     med= edl->edge;
01638 
01639                     if (med->v1==endVert) {
01640                         endVert = med->v2;
01641                         appendPolyLineVert(&polyline, med->v2); totpoly++;
01642                         BLI_freelinkN(&edges, edl);             totedges--;
01643                         ok= TRUE;
01644                     }
01645                     else if (med->v2==endVert) {
01646                         endVert = med->v1;
01647                         appendPolyLineVert(&polyline, endVert); totpoly++;
01648                         BLI_freelinkN(&edges, edl);             totedges--;
01649                         ok= TRUE;
01650                     }
01651                     else if (med->v1==startVert) {
01652                         startVert = med->v2;
01653                         prependPolyLineVert(&polyline, startVert);  totpoly++;
01654                         BLI_freelinkN(&edges, edl);                 totedges--;
01655                         ok= TRUE;
01656                     }
01657                     else if (med->v2==startVert) {
01658                         startVert = med->v1;
01659                         prependPolyLineVert(&polyline, startVert);  totpoly++;
01660                         BLI_freelinkN(&edges, edl);                 totedges--;
01661                         ok= TRUE;
01662                     }
01663                 }
01664             }
01665 
01666             /* Now we have a polyline, make into a curve */
01667             if (startVert==endVert) {
01668                 BLI_freelinkN(&polyline, polyline.last);
01669                 totpoly--;
01670                 closed = TRUE;
01671             }
01672 
01673             /* --- nurbs --- */
01674             {
01675                 Nurb *nu;
01676                 BPoint *bp;
01677                 VertLink *vl;
01678 
01679                 /* create new 'nurb' within the curve */
01680                 nu = (Nurb *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(Nurb), "MeshNurb");
01681 
01682                 nu->pntsu= totpoly;
01683                 nu->pntsv= 1;
01684                 nu->orderu= 4;
01685                 nu->flagu= CU_NURB_ENDPOINT | (closed ? CU_NURB_CYCLIC:0);  /* endpoint */
01686                 nu->resolu= 12;
01687 
01688                 nu->bp= (BPoint *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(BPoint)*totpoly, "bpoints");
01689 
01690                 /* add points */
01691                 vl= polyline.first;
01692                 for (i=0, bp=nu->bp; i < totpoly; i++, bp++, vl=(VertLink *)vl->next) {
01693                     copy_v3_v3(bp->vec, mverts[vl->index].co);
01694                     bp->f1= SELECT;
01695                     bp->radius = bp->weight = 1.0;
01696                 }
01697                 BLI_freelistN(&polyline);
01698 
01699                 /* add nurb to curve */
01700                 BLI_addtail(&cu->nurb, nu);
01701             }
01702             /* --- done with nurbs --- */
01703         }
01704 
01705         ((Mesh *)ob->data)->id.us--;
01706         ob->data= cu;
01707         ob->type= OB_CURVE;
01708 
01709         /* curve objects can't contain DM in usual cases, we could free memory */
01710         needsFree= 1;
01711     }
01712 
01713     dm->needsFree = needsFree;
01714     dm->release(dm);
01715 
01716     if (needsFree) {
01717         ob->derivedFinal = NULL;
01718 
01719         /* curve object could have got bounding box only in special cases */
01720         if (ob->bb) {
01721             MEM_freeN(ob->bb);
01722             ob->bb= NULL;
01723         }
01724     }
01725 }
01726 
01727 void mesh_delete_material_index(Mesh *me, short index)
01728 {
01729     int i;
01730 
01731     for (i=0; i<me->totpoly; i++) {
01732         MPoly *mp = &((MPoly*) me->mpoly)[i];
01733         if (mp->mat_nr && mp->mat_nr>=index) 
01734             mp->mat_nr--;
01735     }
01736     
01737     for (i=0; i<me->totface; i++) {
01738         MFace *mf = &((MFace*) me->mface)[i];
01739         if (mf->mat_nr && mf->mat_nr>=index) 
01740             mf->mat_nr--;
01741     }
01742 }
01743 
01744 void mesh_set_smooth_flag(Object *meshOb, int enableSmooth) 
01745 {
01746     Mesh *me = meshOb->data;
01747     int i;
01748 
01749     for (i=0; i<me->totpoly; i++) {
01750         MPoly *mp = &((MPoly*) me->mpoly)[i];
01751 
01752         if (enableSmooth) {
01753             mp->flag |= ME_SMOOTH;
01754         }
01755         else {
01756             mp->flag &= ~ME_SMOOTH;
01757         }
01758     }
01759     
01760     for (i=0; i<me->totface; i++) {
01761         MFace *mf = &((MFace*) me->mface)[i];
01762 
01763         if (enableSmooth) {
01764             mf->flag |= ME_SMOOTH;
01765         }
01766         else {
01767             mf->flag &= ~ME_SMOOTH;
01768         }
01769     }
01770 }
01771 
01772 void mesh_calc_normals_mapping(MVert *mverts, int numVerts,
01773                                 MLoop *mloop, MPoly *mpolys, int numLoops, int numPolys, float (*polyNors_r)[3],
01774                                 MFace *mfaces, int numFaces, int *origIndexFace, float (*faceNors_r)[3])
01775 {
01776     mesh_calc_normals_mapping_ex(mverts, numVerts, mloop, mpolys,
01777                                   numLoops, numPolys, polyNors_r, mfaces, numFaces,
01778                                   origIndexFace, faceNors_r, TRUE);
01779 }
01780 
01781 void mesh_calc_normals_mapping_ex(MVert *mverts, int numVerts,
01782                                    MLoop *mloop, MPoly *mpolys,
01783                                    int numLoops, int numPolys, float (*polyNors_r)[3],
01784                                    MFace *mfaces, int numFaces, int *origIndexFace, float (*faceNors_r)[3],
01785                                    const short only_face_normals)
01786 {
01787     float (*pnors)[3] = polyNors_r, (*fnors)[3] = faceNors_r;
01788     int i;
01789     MFace *mf;
01790     MPoly *mp;
01791 
01792     if (numPolys == 0) {
01793         return;
01794     }
01795 
01796     /* if we are not calculating verts and no verts were passes thene we have nothign to do */
01797     if ((only_face_normals == TRUE) && (polyNors_r == NULL) && (faceNors_r == NULL)) {
01798         printf("%s: called with nothing to do\n", __func__);
01799         return;
01800     }
01801 
01802     if (!pnors) pnors = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * numPolys, "poly_nors mesh.c");
01803     /* if (!fnors) fnors = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * numFaces, "face nors mesh.c"); */ /* NO NEED TO ALLOC YET */
01804 
01805 
01806     if (only_face_normals == FALSE) {
01807         /* vertex normals are optional, they require some extra calculations,
01808          * so make them optional */
01809         mesh_calc_normals(mverts, numVerts, mloop, mpolys, numLoops, numPolys, pnors);
01810     }
01811     else {
01812         /* only calc poly normals */
01813         mp = mpolys;
01814         for (i=0; i<numPolys; i++, mp++) {
01815             mesh_calc_poly_normal(mp, mloop+mp->loopstart, mverts, pnors[i]);
01816         }
01817     }
01818 
01819     if ( origIndexFace &&
01820          /* fnors==faceNors_r */ /* NO NEED TO ALLOC YET */
01821          fnors != NULL &&
01822          numFaces)
01823     {
01824         mf = mfaces;
01825         for (i=0; i<numFaces; i++, mf++, origIndexFace++) {
01826             if (*origIndexFace < numPolys) {
01827                 copy_v3_v3(fnors[i], pnors[*origIndexFace]);
01828             }
01829             else {
01830                 /* eek, we're not corresponding to polys */
01831                 printf("error in mesh_calc_normals; tessellation face indices are incorrect.  normals may look bad.\n");
01832             }
01833         }
01834     }
01835 
01836     if (pnors != polyNors_r) MEM_freeN(pnors);
01837     /* if (fnors != faceNors_r) MEM_freeN(fnors); */ /* NO NEED TO ALLOC YET */
01838 
01839     fnors = pnors = NULL;
01840     
01841 }
01842 
01843 void mesh_calc_normals(MVert *mverts, int numVerts, MLoop *mloop, MPoly *mpolys,
01844                        int UNUSED(numLoops), int numPolys, float (*polyNors_r)[3])
01845 {
01846     float (*pnors)[3] = polyNors_r;
01847 
01848     float (*tnorms)[3], (*edgevecbuf)[3]= NULL;
01849     float **vertcos = NULL, **vertnos = NULL;
01850     BLI_array_declare(vertcos);
01851     BLI_array_declare(vertnos);
01852     BLI_array_declare(edgevecbuf);
01853 
01854     int i, j;
01855     MPoly *mp;
01856     MLoop *ml;
01857 
01858     if (!pnors) pnors = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * numPolys, "poly_nors mesh.c");
01859 
01860     /*first go through and calculate normals for all the polys*/
01861     tnorms = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3*numVerts, "tnorms mesh.c");
01862 
01863     mp = mpolys;
01864     for (i=0; i<numPolys; i++, mp++) {
01865         mesh_calc_poly_normal(mp, mloop+mp->loopstart, mverts, pnors[i]);
01866         ml = mloop + mp->loopstart;
01867 
01868         BLI_array_empty(vertcos);
01869         BLI_array_empty(vertnos);
01870         BLI_array_growitems(vertcos, mp->totloop);
01871         BLI_array_growitems(vertnos, mp->totloop);
01872 
01873         for (j=0; j < mp->totloop; j++) {
01874             int vindex = ml[j].v;
01875             vertcos[j] = mverts[vindex].co;
01876             vertnos[j] = tnorms[vindex];
01877         }
01878 
01879         BLI_array_empty(edgevecbuf);
01880         BLI_array_growitems(edgevecbuf, mp->totloop);
01881 
01882         accumulate_vertex_normals_poly(vertnos, pnors[i], vertcos, edgevecbuf, mp->totloop);
01883     }
01884 
01885     BLI_array_free(vertcos);
01886     BLI_array_free(vertnos);
01887     BLI_array_free(edgevecbuf);
01888 
01889     /* following Mesh convention; we use vertex coordinate itself for normal in this case */
01890     for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++) {
01891         MVert *mv= &mverts[i];
01892         float *no= tnorms[i];
01893 
01894         if (normalize_v3(no) == 0.0f)
01895             normalize_v3_v3(no, mv->co);
01896 
01897         normal_float_to_short_v3(mv->no, no);
01898     }
01899 
01900     MEM_freeN(tnorms);
01901 
01902     if (pnors != polyNors_r) MEM_freeN(pnors);
01903 }
01904 
01905 void mesh_calc_normals_tessface(MVert *mverts, int numVerts, MFace *mfaces, int numFaces, float (*faceNors_r)[3])
01906 {
01907     float (*tnorms)[3]= MEM_callocN(numVerts*sizeof(*tnorms), "tnorms");
01908     float (*fnors)[3]= (faceNors_r)? faceNors_r: MEM_callocN(sizeof(*fnors)*numFaces, "meshnormals");
01909     int i;
01910 
01911     for (i=0; i<numFaces; i++) {
01912         MFace *mf= &mfaces[i];
01913         float *f_no= fnors[i];
01914         float *n4 = (mf->v4)? tnorms[mf->v4]: NULL;
01915         float *c4 = (mf->v4)? mverts[mf->v4].co: NULL;
01916 
01917         if (mf->v4)
01918             normal_quad_v3(f_no, mverts[mf->v1].co, mverts[mf->v2].co, mverts[mf->v3].co, mverts[mf->v4].co);
01919         else
01920             normal_tri_v3(f_no, mverts[mf->v1].co, mverts[mf->v2].co, mverts[mf->v3].co);
01921 
01922         accumulate_vertex_normals(tnorms[mf->v1], tnorms[mf->v2], tnorms[mf->v3], n4,
01923             f_no, mverts[mf->v1].co, mverts[mf->v2].co, mverts[mf->v3].co, c4);
01924     }
01925 
01926     /* following Mesh convention; we use vertex coordinate itself for normal in this case */
01927     for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++) {
01928         MVert *mv= &mverts[i];
01929         float *no= tnorms[i];
01930         
01931         if (normalize_v3(no) == 0.0f)
01932             normalize_v3_v3(no, mv->co);
01933 
01934         normal_float_to_short_v3(mv->no, no);
01935     }
01936     
01937     MEM_freeN(tnorms);
01938 
01939     if (fnors != faceNors_r)
01940         MEM_freeN(fnors);
01941 }
01942 
01943 
01944 static void bm_corners_to_loops(Mesh *me, int findex, int loopstart, int numTex, int numCol)
01945 {
01946     MTFace *texface;
01947     MTexPoly *texpoly;
01948     MCol *mcol;
01949     MLoopCol *mloopcol;
01950     MLoopUV *mloopuv;
01951     MFace *mf;
01952     int i;
01953 
01954     mf = me->mface + findex;
01955 
01956     for (i=0; i < numTex; i++) {
01957         texface = CustomData_get_n(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE, findex, i);
01958         texpoly = CustomData_get_n(&me->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, findex, i); 
01959         
01960         ME_MTEXFACE_CPY(texpoly, texface);
01961     
01962         mloopuv = CustomData_get_n(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, loopstart, i);
01963         copy_v2_v2(mloopuv->uv, texface->uv[0]); mloopuv++;
01964         copy_v2_v2(mloopuv->uv, texface->uv[1]); mloopuv++;
01965         copy_v2_v2(mloopuv->uv, texface->uv[2]); mloopuv++;
01966 
01967         if (mf->v4) {
01968             copy_v2_v2(mloopuv->uv, texface->uv[3]); mloopuv++;
01969         }
01970     }
01971 
01972     for (i=0; i < numCol; i++) {
01973         mloopcol = CustomData_get_n(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, loopstart, i);
01974         mcol = CustomData_get_n(&me->fdata, CD_MCOL, findex, i);
01975 
01976         MESH_MLOOPCOL_FROM_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[0]); mloopcol++;
01977         MESH_MLOOPCOL_FROM_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[1]); mloopcol++;
01978         MESH_MLOOPCOL_FROM_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[2]); mloopcol++;
01979         if (mf->v4) {
01980             MESH_MLOOPCOL_FROM_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[3]); mloopcol++;
01981         }
01982     }
01983     
01984     if (CustomData_has_layer(&me->fdata, CD_MDISPS)) {
01985         MDisps *ld = CustomData_get(&me->ldata, loopstart, CD_MDISPS);
01986         MDisps *fd = CustomData_get(&me->fdata, findex, CD_MDISPS);
01987         float (*disps)[3] = fd->disps;
01988         int i, tot = mf->v4 ? 4 : 3;
01989         int side, corners;
01990 
01991         if (CustomData_external_test(&me->fdata, CD_MDISPS)) {
01992             CustomData_external_add(&me->ldata, &me->id, CD_MDISPS,
01993                                     me->totloop, me->fdata.external->filename);
01994         }
01995         
01996         corners = multires_mdisp_corners(fd);
01997         
01998         if (corners == 0) {
01999             /* Empty MDisp layers appear in at least one of the sintel.blend files.
02000              * Not sure why this happens, but it seems fine to just ignore them here.
02001              * If corners==0 for a non-empty layer though, something went wrong. */
02002             BLI_assert(fd->totdisp == 0);
02003         }
02004         else {
02005             side = sqrt(fd->totdisp / corners);
02006         
02007             for (i=0; i<tot; i++, disps += side*side, ld++) {
02008                 ld->totdisp = side*side;
02009                 ld->level = (int)(logf(side - 1.0f) / M_LN2) + 1;
02010             
02011                 if (ld->disps)
02012                     MEM_freeN(ld->disps);
02013             
02014                 ld->disps = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3*side*side, "converted loop mdisps");
02015                 if (fd->disps) {
02016                     memcpy(ld->disps, disps, sizeof(float)*3*side*side);
02017                 }
02018             }
02019         }
02020     }
02021 }
02022 
02023 void BKE_mesh_convert_mfaces_to_mpolys(Mesh *mesh)
02024 {
02025     MFace *mf;
02026     MLoop *ml;
02027     MPoly *mp;
02028     MEdge *me;
02029     EdgeHash *eh;
02030     int numTex, numCol;
02031     int i, j, totloop;
02032 
02033     /* just in case some of these layers are filled in (can happen with python created meshes) */
02034     CustomData_free(&mesh->ldata, mesh->totloop);
02035     CustomData_free(&mesh->pdata, mesh->totpoly);
02036     memset(&mesh->ldata, 0, sizeof(mesh->ldata));
02037     memset(&mesh->pdata, 0, sizeof(mesh->pdata));
02038 
02039     mesh->totpoly = mesh->totface;
02040     mesh->mpoly = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MPoly)*mesh->totpoly, "mpoly converted");
02041     CustomData_add_layer(&mesh->pdata, CD_MPOLY, CD_ASSIGN, mesh->mpoly, mesh->totpoly);
02042 
02043     numTex = CustomData_number_of_layers(&mesh->fdata, CD_MTFACE);
02044     numCol = CustomData_number_of_layers(&mesh->fdata, CD_MCOL);
02045     
02046     totloop = 0;
02047     mf = mesh->mface;
02048     for (i=0; i<mesh->totface; i++, mf++) {
02049         totloop += mf->v4 ? 4 : 3;
02050     }
02051     
02052     mesh->totloop = totloop;
02053     mesh->mloop = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MLoop)*mesh->totloop, "mloop converted");
02054 
02055     CustomData_add_layer(&mesh->ldata, CD_MLOOP, CD_ASSIGN, mesh->mloop, totloop);
02056     CustomData_to_bmeshpoly(&mesh->fdata, &mesh->pdata, &mesh->ldata,
02057         mesh->totloop, mesh->totpoly);
02058 
02059     /* ensure external data is transferred */
02060     CustomData_external_read(&mesh->fdata, &mesh->id, CD_MASK_MDISPS, mesh->totface);
02061 
02062     eh = BLI_edgehash_new();
02063 
02064     /*build edge hash*/
02065     me = mesh->medge;
02066     for (i = 0; i < mesh->totedge; i++, me++) {
02067         BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, me->v1, me->v2, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
02068 
02069         /* unrelated but avoid having the FGON flag enabled, so we can reuse it later for something else */
02070         me->flag &= ~ME_FGON;
02071     }
02072 
02073     j = 0; /*current loop index*/
02074     ml = mesh->mloop;
02075     mf = mesh->mface;
02076     mp = mesh->mpoly;
02077     for (i=0; i<mesh->totface; i++, mf++, mp++) {
02078         mp->loopstart = j;
02079         
02080         mp->totloop = mf->v4 ? 4 : 3;
02081 
02082         mp->mat_nr = mf->mat_nr;
02083         mp->flag = mf->flag;
02084         
02085 #       define ML(v1, v2) {ml->v = mf->v1; ml->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(eh, mf->v1, mf->v2)); ml++; j++;}
02086         
02087         ML(v1, v2);
02088         ML(v2, v3);
02089         if (mf->v4) {
02090             ML(v3, v4);
02091             ML(v4, v1);
02092         }
02093         else {
02094             ML(v3, v1);
02095         }
02096         
02097 #       undef ML
02098 
02099         bm_corners_to_loops(mesh, i, mp->loopstart, numTex, numCol);
02100     }
02101 
02102     /* note, we don't convert FGons at all, these are not even real ngons,
02103      * they have their own UV's, colors etc - its more an editing feature. */
02104 
02105     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(mesh, TRUE);
02106 
02107     BLI_edgehash_free(eh, NULL);
02108 }
02109 
02110 float (*mesh_getVertexCos(Mesh *me, int *numVerts_r))[3]
02111 {
02112     int i, numVerts = me->totvert;
02113     float (*cos)[3] = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*cos)*numVerts, "vertexcos1");
02114 
02115     if (numVerts_r) *numVerts_r = numVerts;
02116     for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++)
02117         copy_v3_v3(cos[i], me->mvert[i].co);
02118 
02119     return cos;
02120 }
02121 
02122 
02123 /* ngon version wip, based on EDBM_uv_vert_map_create */
02124 /* this replaces the non bmesh function (in trunk) which takes MTFace's, if we ever need it back we could
02125  * but for now this replaces it because its unused. */
02126 
02127 UvVertMap *make_uv_vert_map(struct MPoly *mpoly, struct MLoop *mloop, struct MLoopUV *mloopuv, unsigned int totpoly, unsigned int totvert, int selected, float *limit)
02128 {
02129     UvVertMap *vmap;
02130     UvMapVert *buf;
02131     MPoly *mp;
02132     unsigned int a;
02133     int i, totuv, nverts;
02134 
02135     totuv = 0;
02136 
02137     /* generate UvMapVert array */
02138     mp= mpoly;
02139     for (a=0; a<totpoly; a++, mp++)
02140         if (!selected || (!(mp->flag & ME_HIDE) && (mp->flag & ME_FACE_SEL)))
02141             totuv += mp->totloop;
02142 
02143     if (totuv==0)
02144         return NULL;
02145     
02146     vmap= (UvVertMap*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(*vmap), "UvVertMap");
02147     if (!vmap)
02148         return NULL;
02149 
02150     vmap->vert= (UvMapVert**)MEM_callocN(sizeof(*vmap->vert)*totvert, "UvMapVert*");
02151     buf= vmap->buf= (UvMapVert*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(*vmap->buf)*totuv, "UvMapVert");
02152 
02153     if (!vmap->vert || !vmap->buf) {
02154         free_uv_vert_map(vmap);
02155         return NULL;
02156     }
02157 
02158     mp= mpoly;
02159     for (a=0; a<totpoly; a++, mp++) {
02160         if (!selected || (!(mp->flag & ME_HIDE) && (mp->flag & ME_FACE_SEL))) {
02161             nverts= mp->totloop;
02162 
02163             for (i=0; i<nverts; i++) {
02164                 buf->tfindex= i;
02165                 buf->f= a;
02166                 buf->separate = 0;
02167                 buf->next= vmap->vert[mloop[mp->loopstart + i].v];
02168                 vmap->vert[mloop[mp->loopstart + i].v]= buf;
02169                 buf++;
02170             }
02171         }
02172     }
02173     
02174     /* sort individual uvs for each vert */
02175     for (a=0; a<totvert; a++) {
02176         UvMapVert *newvlist= NULL, *vlist=vmap->vert[a];
02177         UvMapVert *iterv, *v, *lastv, *next;
02178         float *uv, *uv2, uvdiff[2];
02179 
02180         while (vlist) {
02181             v= vlist;
02182             vlist= vlist->next;
02183             v->next= newvlist;
02184             newvlist= v;
02185 
02186             uv= mloopuv[mpoly[v->f].loopstart + v->tfindex].uv;
02187             lastv= NULL;
02188             iterv= vlist;
02189 
02190             while (iterv) {
02191                 next= iterv->next;
02192 
02193                 uv2= mloopuv[mpoly[iterv->f].loopstart + iterv->tfindex].uv;
02194                 sub_v2_v2v2(uvdiff, uv2, uv);
02195 
02196 
02197                 if (fabsf(uv[0]-uv2[0]) < limit[0] && fabsf(uv[1]-uv2[1]) < limit[1]) {
02198                     if (lastv) lastv->next= next;
02199                     else vlist= next;
02200                     iterv->next= newvlist;
02201                     newvlist= iterv;
02202                 }
02203                 else
02204                     lastv=iterv;
02205 
02206                 iterv= next;
02207             }
02208 
02209             newvlist->separate = 1;
02210         }
02211 
02212         vmap->vert[a]= newvlist;
02213     }
02214     
02215     return vmap;
02216 }
02217 
02218 UvMapVert *get_uv_map_vert(UvVertMap *vmap, unsigned int v)
02219 {
02220     return vmap->vert[v];
02221 }
02222 
02223 void free_uv_vert_map(UvVertMap *vmap)
02224 {
02225     if (vmap) {
02226         if (vmap->vert) MEM_freeN(vmap->vert);
02227         if (vmap->buf) MEM_freeN(vmap->buf);
02228         MEM_freeN(vmap);
02229     }
02230 }
02231 
02232 /* Generates a map where the key is the vertex and the value is a list
02233  * of polys that use that vertex as a corner. The lists are allocated
02234  * from one memory pool. */
02235 void create_vert_poly_map(MeshElemMap **map, int **mem,
02236                           const MPoly *mpoly, const MLoop *mloop,
02237                           int totvert, int totpoly, int totloop)
02238 {
02239     int i, j;
02240     int *indices;
02241 
02242     (*map) = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MeshElemMap) * totvert, "vert poly map");
02243     (*mem) = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * totloop, "vert poly map mem");
02244 
02245     /* Count number of polys for each vertex */
02246     for (i = 0; i < totpoly; i++) {
02247         const MPoly *p = &mpoly[i];
02248         
02249         for (j = 0; j < p->totloop; j++)
02250             (*map)[mloop[p->loopstart + j].v].count++;
02251     }
02252 
02253     /* Assign indices mem */
02254     indices = (*mem);
02255     for (i = 0; i < totvert; i++) {
02256         (*map)[i].indices = indices;
02257         indices += (*map)[i].count;
02258 
02259         /* Reset 'count' for use as index in last loop */
02260         (*map)[i].count = 0;
02261     }
02262         
02263     /* Find the users */
02264     for (i = 0; i < totpoly; i++) {
02265         const MPoly *p = &mpoly[i];
02266         
02267         for (j = 0; j < p->totloop; j++) {
02268             int v = mloop[p->loopstart + j].v;
02269             
02270             (*map)[v].indices[(*map)[v].count] = i;
02271             (*map)[v].count++;
02272         }
02273     }
02274 }
02275 
02276 /* Generates a map where the key is the vertex and the value is a list
02277  * of edges that use that vertex as an endpoint. The lists are allocated
02278  * from one memory pool. */
02279 void create_vert_edge_map(ListBase **map, IndexNode **mem, const MEdge *medge, const int totvert, const int totedge)
02280 {
02281     int i, j;
02282     IndexNode *node = NULL;
02283  
02284     (*map) = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ListBase) * totvert, "vert edge map");
02285     (*mem) = MEM_callocN(sizeof(IndexNode) * totedge * 2, "vert edge map mem");
02286     node = *mem;
02287 
02288     /* Find the users */
