02289     for (i = 0; i < totedge; ++i) {
02290         for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j, ++node) {
02291             node->index = i;
02292             BLI_addtail(&(*map)[((unsigned int*)(&medge[i].v1))[j]], node);
02293         }
02294     }
02295 }
02296 
02297 void mesh_loops_to_mface_corners(CustomData *fdata, CustomData *ldata,
02298                                  CustomData *pdata, int lindex[4], int findex,
02299                                  const int polyindex,
02300                                  const int mf_len, /* 3 or 4 */
02301 
02302                                  /* cache values to avoid lookups every time */
02303                                  const int numTex, /* CustomData_number_of_layers(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY) */
02304                                  const int numCol, /* CustomData_number_of_layers(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL) */
02305                                  const int hasPCol, /* CustomData_has_layer(ldata, CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL) */
02306                                  const int hasOrigSpace /* CustomData_has_layer(ldata, CD_ORIGSPACE_MLOOP) */
02307                                  )
02308 {
02309     MTFace *texface;
02310     MTexPoly *texpoly;
02311     MCol *mcol;
02312     MLoopCol *mloopcol;
02313     MLoopUV *mloopuv;
02314     int i, j;
02315     
02316     for (i=0; i < numTex; i++) {
02317         texface = CustomData_get_n(fdata, CD_MTFACE, findex, i);
02318         texpoly = CustomData_get_n(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, polyindex, i);
02319 
02320         ME_MTEXFACE_CPY(texface, texpoly);
02321 
02322         for (j=0; j < mf_len; j++) {
02323             mloopuv = CustomData_get_n(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, lindex[j], i);
02324             copy_v2_v2(texface->uv[j], mloopuv->uv);
02325         }
02326     }
02327 
02328     for (i=0; i < numCol; i++) {
02329         mcol = CustomData_get_n(fdata, CD_MCOL, findex, i);
02330 
02331         for (j=0; j < mf_len; j++) {
02332             mloopcol = CustomData_get_n(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, lindex[j], i);
02333             MESH_MLOOPCOL_TO_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[j]);
02334         }
02335     }
02336 
02337     if (hasPCol) {
02338         mcol = CustomData_get(fdata,  findex, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL);
02339 
02340         for (j=0; j < mf_len; j++) {
02341             mloopcol = CustomData_get(ldata, lindex[j], CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL);
02342             MESH_MLOOPCOL_TO_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[j]);
02343         }
02344     }
02345 
02346     if (hasOrigSpace) {
02347         OrigSpaceFace *of = CustomData_get(fdata, findex, CD_ORIGSPACE);
02348         OrigSpaceLoop *lof;
02349 
02350         for (j=0; j < mf_len; j++) {
02351             lof = CustomData_get(ldata, lindex[j], CD_ORIGSPACE_MLOOP);
02352             copy_v2_v2(of->uv[j], lof->uv);
02353         }
02354     }
02355 }
02356 
02357 /*
02358  * this function recreates a tessellation.
02359  * returns number of tessellation faces.
02360  */
02361 int mesh_recalcTessellation(CustomData *fdata,
02362                            CustomData *ldata, CustomData *pdata,
02363                            MVert *mvert, int totface, int UNUSED(totloop),
02364                            int totpoly,
02365                            /* when tessellating to recalculate normals after
02366                             * we can skip copying here */
02367                            const int do_face_nor_cpy)
02368 {
02369     /* use this to avoid locking pthread for _every_ polygon
02370      * and calling the fill function */
02371 
02372 #define USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP
02373 #define USE_TESSFACE_QUADS // NEEDS FURTHER TESTING
02374 
02375 #define TESSFACE_SCANFILL (1<<0)
02376 #define TESSFACE_IS_QUAD  (1<<1)
02377 
02378     MPoly *mp, *mpoly;
02379     MLoop *ml, *mloop;
02380     MFace *mface = NULL, *mf;
02381     BLI_array_declare(mface);
02382     ScanFillContext sf_ctx;
02383     ScanFillVert *v, *lastv, *firstv;
02384     ScanFillFace *f;
02385     int *mface_orig_index = NULL;
02386     BLI_array_declare(mface_orig_index);
02387     int *mface_to_poly_map = NULL;
02388     BLI_array_declare(mface_to_poly_map);
02389     int lindex[4]; /* only ever use 3 in this case */
02390     int *poly_orig_index;
02391     int poly_index, j, mface_index;
02392 
02393     const int numTex = CustomData_number_of_layers(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02394     const int numCol = CustomData_number_of_layers(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
02395     const int hasPCol = CustomData_has_layer(ldata, CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL);
02396     const int hasOrigSpace = CustomData_has_layer(ldata, CD_ORIGSPACE_MLOOP);
02397 
02398     mpoly = CustomData_get_layer(pdata, CD_MPOLY);
02399     mloop = CustomData_get_layer(ldata, CD_MLOOP);
02400 
02401     /* allocate the length of totfaces, avoid many small reallocs,
02402      * if all faces are tri's it will be correct, quads == 2x allocs */
02403     BLI_array_reserve(mface_to_poly_map, totpoly);
02404     BLI_array_reserve(mface, totpoly);
02405 
02406     mface_index = 0;
02407     mp = mpoly;
02408     poly_orig_index = CustomData_get_layer(pdata, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02409     for (poly_index = 0; poly_index < totpoly; poly_index++, mp++) {
02410         if (mp->totloop < 3) {
02411             /* do nothing */
02412         }
02413 
02414 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP
02415 
02416 #define ML_TO_MF(i1, i2, i3)                                                  \
02417         BLI_array_growone(mface_to_poly_map);                                 \
02418         BLI_array_growone(mface);                                             \
02419         mface_to_poly_map[mface_index] = poly_index;                          \
02420         mf= &mface[mface_index];                                              \
02421         /* set loop indices, transformed to vert indices later */             \
02422         mf->v1 = mp->loopstart + i1;                                          \
02423         mf->v2 = mp->loopstart + i2;                                          \
02424         mf->v3 = mp->loopstart + i3;                                          \
02425         mf->v4 = 0;                                                           \
02426         mf->mat_nr = mp->mat_nr;                                              \
02427         mf->flag = mp->flag;                                                  \
02428         if (poly_orig_index) {                                                \
02429             BLI_array_append(mface_orig_index,                                \
02430                              poly_orig_index[poly_index]);                    \
02431         }                                                                     \
02432         (void)0
02433 
02434 /* ALMOST IDENTICAL TO DEFINE ABOVE (see EXCEPTION) */
02435 #define ML_TO_MF_QUAD()                                                       \
02436         BLI_array_growone(mface_to_poly_map);                                 \
02437         BLI_array_growone(mface);                                             \
02438         mface_to_poly_map[mface_index] = poly_index;                          \
02439         mf= &mface[mface_index];                                              \
02440         /* set loop indices, transformed to vert indices later */             \
02441         mf->v1 = mp->loopstart + 0; /* EXCEPTION */                           \
02442         mf->v2 = mp->loopstart + 1; /* EXCEPTION */                           \
02443         mf->v3 = mp->loopstart + 2; /* EXCEPTION */                           \
02444         mf->v4 = mp->loopstart + 3; /* EXCEPTION */                           \
02445         mf->mat_nr = mp->mat_nr;                                              \
02446         mf->flag = mp->flag;                                                  \
02447         if (poly_orig_index) {                                                \
02448             BLI_array_append(mface_orig_index,                                \
02449                              poly_orig_index[poly_index]);                    \
02450         }                                                                     \
02451         mf->edcode |= TESSFACE_IS_QUAD; /* EXCEPTION */                       \
02452         (void)0
02453 
02454 
02455         else if (mp->totloop == 3) {
02456             ML_TO_MF(0, 1, 2);
02457             mface_index++;
02458         }
02459         else if (mp->totloop == 4) {
02460 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_QUADS
02461             ML_TO_MF_QUAD();
02462             mface_index++;
02463 #else
02464             ML_TO_MF(0, 1, 2);
02465             mface_index++;
02466             ML_TO_MF(0, 2, 3);
02467             mface_index++;
02468 #endif
02469         }
02470 #endif /* USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP */
02471         else {
02472             int totfilltri;
02473 
02474             ml = mloop + mp->loopstart;
02475             
02476             BLI_begin_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
02477             firstv = NULL;
02478             lastv = NULL;
02479             for (j=0; j<mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
02480                 v = BLI_addfillvert(&sf_ctx, mvert[ml->v].co);
02481     
02482                 v->keyindex = mp->loopstart + j;
02483     
02484                 if (lastv)
02485                     BLI_addfilledge(&sf_ctx, lastv, v);
02486     
02487                 if (!firstv)
02488                     firstv = v;
02489                 lastv = v;
02490             }
02491             BLI_addfilledge(&sf_ctx, lastv, firstv);
02492             
02493             totfilltri = BLI_edgefill(&sf_ctx, FALSE);
02494             if (totfilltri) {
02495                 BLI_array_growitems(mface_to_poly_map, totfilltri);
02496                 BLI_array_growitems(mface, totfilltri);
02497                 if (poly_orig_index) {
02498                     BLI_array_growitems(mface_orig_index, totfilltri);
02499                 }
02500 
02501                 for (f = sf_ctx.fillfacebase.first; f; f = f->next, mf++) {
02502                     mface_to_poly_map[mface_index] = poly_index;
02503                     mf= &mface[mface_index];
02504 
02505                     /* set loop indices, transformed to vert indices later */
02506                     mf->v1 = f->v1->keyindex;
02507                     mf->v2 = f->v2->keyindex;
02508                     mf->v3 = f->v3->keyindex;
02509                     mf->v4 = 0;
02510 
02511                     mf->mat_nr = mp->mat_nr;
02512                     mf->flag = mp->flag;
02513 
02514 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP
02515                     mf->edcode |= TESSFACE_SCANFILL; /* tag for sorting loop indices */
02516 #endif
02517 
02518                     if (poly_orig_index) {
02519                         mface_orig_index[mface_index] = poly_orig_index[poly_index];
02520                     }
02521 
02522                     mface_index++;
02523                 }
02524             }
02525     
02526             BLI_end_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
02527         }
02528     }
02529 
02530     CustomData_free(fdata, totface);
02531     memset(fdata, 0, sizeof(CustomData));
02532     totface = mface_index;
02533 
02534 
02535     /* not essential but without this we store over-alloc'd memory in the CustomData layers */
02536     if (LIKELY((MEM_allocN_len(mface) / sizeof(*mface)) != totface)) {
02537         mface = MEM_reallocN(mface, sizeof(*mface) * totface);
02538         mface_to_poly_map = MEM_reallocN(mface_to_poly_map, sizeof(*mface_to_poly_map) * totface);
02539         if (mface_orig_index) {
02540             mface_orig_index = MEM_reallocN(mface_orig_index, sizeof(*mface_orig_index) * totface);
02541         }
02542     }
02543 
02544     CustomData_add_layer(fdata, CD_MFACE, CD_ASSIGN, mface, totface);
02545 
02546     /* CD_POLYINDEX will contain an array of indices from tessfaces to the polygons
02547      * they are directly tessellated from */
02548     CustomData_add_layer(fdata, CD_POLYINDEX, CD_ASSIGN, mface_to_poly_map, totface);
02549     if (mface_orig_index) {
02550         /* If polys had a CD_ORIGINDEX layer, then the tessellated faces will get this
02551          * layer as well, pointing to polys from the original mesh (not the polys
02552          * that just got tessellated) */
02553         CustomData_add_layer(fdata, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_ASSIGN, mface_orig_index, totface);
02554     }
02555 
02556     CustomData_from_bmeshpoly(fdata, pdata, ldata, totface);
02557 
02558     if (do_face_nor_cpy) {
02559         /* If polys have a normals layer, copying that to faces can help
02560          * avoid the need to recalculate normals later */
02561         if (CustomData_has_layer(pdata, CD_NORMAL)) {
02562             float (*pnors)[3] = CustomData_get_layer(pdata, CD_NORMAL);
02563             float (*fnors)[3] = CustomData_add_layer(fdata, CD_NORMAL, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totface);
02564             for (mface_index = 0; mface_index < totface; mface_index++) {
02565                 copy_v3_v3(fnors[mface_index], pnors[mface_to_poly_map[mface_index]]);
02566             }
02567         }
02568     }
02569 
02570     mf = mface;
02571     for (mface_index=0; mface_index < totface; mface_index++, mf++) {
02572 
02573 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_QUADS
02574         const int mf_len = mf->edcode & TESSFACE_IS_QUAD ? 4 : 3;
02575 #endif
02576 
02577 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP
02578         /* skip sorting when not using ngons */
02579         if (UNLIKELY(mf->edcode & TESSFACE_SCANFILL))
02580 #endif
02581         {
02582             /* sort loop indices to ensure winding is correct */
02583             if (mf->v1 > mf->v2) SWAP(int, mf->v1, mf->v2);
02584             if (mf->v2 > mf->v3) SWAP(int, mf->v2, mf->v3);
02585             if (mf->v1 > mf->v2) SWAP(int, mf->v1, mf->v2);
02586 
02587             if (mf->v1 > mf->v2) SWAP(int, mf->v1, mf->v2);
02588             if (mf->v2 > mf->v3) SWAP(int, mf->v2, mf->v3);
02589             if (mf->v1 > mf->v2) SWAP(int, mf->v1, mf->v2);
02590         }
02591 
02592         /* end abusing the edcode */
02593 #if defined(USE_TESSFACE_QUADS) || defined(USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP)
02594         mf->edcode = 0;
02595 #endif
02596 
02597 
02598         lindex[0] = mf->v1;
02599         lindex[1] = mf->v2;
02600         lindex[2] = mf->v3;
02601 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_QUADS
02602         if (mf_len == 4) lindex[3] = mf->v4;
02603 #endif
02604 
02605         /*transform loop indices to vert indices*/
02606         mf->v1 = mloop[mf->v1].v;
02607         mf->v2 = mloop[mf->v2].v;
02608         mf->v3 = mloop[mf->v3].v;
02609 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_QUADS
02610         if (mf_len == 4) mf->v4 = mloop[mf->v4].v;
02611 #endif
02612 
02613         mesh_loops_to_mface_corners(fdata, ldata, pdata,
02614                                     lindex, mface_index, mface_to_poly_map[mface_index],
02615 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_QUADS
02616                                     mf_len,
02617 #else
02618                                     3,
02619 #endif
02620                                     numTex, numCol, hasPCol, hasOrigSpace);
02621 
02622 
02623 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_QUADS
02624         test_index_face(mf, fdata, mface_index, mf_len);
02625 #endif
02626 
02627     }
02628 
02629     return totface;
02630 
02631 #undef USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP
02632 
02633 }
02634 
02635 
02636 #ifdef USE_BMESH_SAVE_AS_COMPAT
02637 
02638 /*
02639  * this function recreates a tessellation.
02640  * returns number of tessellation faces.
02641  */
02642 int mesh_mpoly_to_mface(struct CustomData *fdata, struct CustomData *ldata,
02643     struct CustomData *pdata, int totface, int UNUSED(totloop), int totpoly)
02644 {
02645     MLoop *mloop;
02646 
02647     int lindex[4];
02648     int i;
02649     int k;
02650 
02651     MPoly *mp, *mpoly;
02652     MFace *mface = NULL, *mf;
02653     BLI_array_declare(mface);
02654 
02655     const int numTex = CustomData_number_of_layers(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02656     const int numCol = CustomData_number_of_layers(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
02657     const int hasPCol = CustomData_has_layer(ldata, CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL);
02658     const int hasOrigSpace = CustomData_has_layer(ldata, CD_ORIGSPACE_MLOOP);
02659 
02660     mpoly = CustomData_get_layer(pdata, CD_MPOLY);
02661     mloop = CustomData_get_layer(ldata, CD_MLOOP);
02662 
02663     mp = mpoly;
02664     k = 0;
02665     for (i = 0; i<totpoly; i++, mp++) {
02666         if (ELEM(mp->totloop, 3, 4)) {
02667             BLI_array_growone(mface);
02668             mf = &mface[k];
02669 
02670             mf->mat_nr = mp->mat_nr;
02671             mf->flag = mp->flag;
02672 
02673             mf->v1 = mp->loopstart + 0;
02674             mf->v2 = mp->loopstart + 1;
02675             mf->v3 = mp->loopstart + 2;
02676             mf->v4 = (mp->totloop == 4) ? (mp->loopstart + 3) : 0;
02677 
02678             /* abuse edcode for temp storage and clear next loop */
02679             mf->edcode = (char)mp->totloop; /* only ever 3 or 4 */
02680 
02681             k++;
02682         }
02683     }
02684 
02685     CustomData_free(fdata, totface);
02686     memset(fdata, 0, sizeof(CustomData));
02687 
02688     totface= k;
02689 
02690     CustomData_add_layer(fdata, CD_MFACE, CD_ASSIGN, mface, totface);
02691 
02692     CustomData_from_bmeshpoly(fdata, pdata, ldata, totface);
02693 
02694     mp = mpoly;
02695     k = 0;
02696     for (i = 0; i<totpoly; i++, mp++) {
02697         if (ELEM(mp->totloop, 3, 4)) {
02698             mf = &mface[k];
02699 
02700             if (mf->edcode == 3) {
02701                 /*sort loop indices to ensure winding is correct*/
02702                 /* NO SORT - looks like we can skip this */
02703 
02704                 lindex[0] = mf->v1;
02705                 lindex[1] = mf->v2;
02706                 lindex[2] = mf->v3;
02707                 lindex[3] = 0; /* unused */
02708 
02709                 /*transform loop indices to vert indices*/
02710                 mf->v1 = mloop[mf->v1].v;
02711                 mf->v2 = mloop[mf->v2].v;
02712                 mf->v3 = mloop[mf->v3].v;
02713 
02714                 mesh_loops_to_mface_corners(fdata, ldata, pdata,
02715                                             lindex, k, i, 3,
02716                                             numTex, numCol, hasPCol, hasOrigSpace);
02717                 test_index_face(mf, fdata, k, 3);
02718             }
02719             else {
02720                 /*sort loop indices to ensure winding is correct*/
02721                 /* NO SORT - looks like we can skip this */
02722 
02723                 lindex[0] = mf->v1;
02724                 lindex[1] = mf->v2;
02725                 lindex[2] = mf->v3;
02726                 lindex[3] = mf->v4;
02727 
02728                 /*transform loop indices to vert indices*/
02729                 mf->v1 = mloop[mf->v1].v;
02730                 mf->v2 = mloop[mf->v2].v;
02731                 mf->v3 = mloop[mf->v3].v;
02732                 mf->v4 = mloop[mf->v4].v;
02733 
02734                 mesh_loops_to_mface_corners(fdata, ldata, pdata,
02735                                             lindex, k, i, 4,
02736                                             numTex, numCol, hasPCol, hasOrigSpace);
02737                 test_index_face(mf, fdata, k, 4);
02738             }
02739 
02740             mf->edcode= 0;
02741 
02742             k++;
02743         }
02744     }
02745 
02746     return k;
02747 }
02748 #endif /* USE_BMESH_SAVE_AS_COMPAT */
02749 
02750 /*
02751  * COMPUTE POLY NORMAL
02752  *
02753  * Computes the normal of a planar 
02754  * polygon See Graphics Gems for 
02755  * computing newell normal.
02756  *
02757  */
02758 static void mesh_calc_ngon_normal(MPoly *mpoly, MLoop *loopstart, 
02759                                   MVert *mvert, float normal[3])
02760 {
02761 
02762     MVert *v1, *v2, *v3;
02763     double u[3], v[3], w[3];
02764     double n[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, l;
02765     int i;
02766 
02767     for (i = 0; i < mpoly->totloop; i++) {
02768         v1 = mvert + loopstart[i].v;
02769         v2 = mvert + loopstart[(i+1)%mpoly->totloop].v;
02770         v3 = mvert + loopstart[(i+2)%mpoly->totloop].v;
02771         
02772         copy_v3db_v3fl(u, v1->co);
02773         copy_v3db_v3fl(v, v2->co);
02774         copy_v3db_v3fl(w, v3->co);
02775 
02776         /*this fixes some weird numerical error*/
02777         if (i==0) {
02778             u[0] += 0.0001f;
02779             u[1] += 0.0001f;
02780             u[2] += 0.0001f;
02781         }
02782         
02783         /* newell's method
02784          * 
02785          * so thats?:
02786          * (a[1] - b[1]) * (a[2] + b[2]);
02787          * a[1]*b[2] - b[1]*a[2] - b[1]*b[2] + a[1]*a[2]
02788          * 
02789          * odd.  half of that is the cross product. . .what's the
02790          * other half?
02791          * 
02792          * also could be like a[1]*(b[2] + a[2]) - b[1]*(a[2] - b[2])
02793          */
02794 
02795         n[0] += (u[1] - v[1]) * (u[2] + v[2]);
02796         n[1] += (u[2] - v[2]) * (u[0] + v[0]);
02797         n[2] += (u[0] - v[0]) * (u[1] + v[1]);
02798     }
02799     
02800     l = n[0]*n[0]+n[1]*n[1]+n[2]*n[2];
02801     l = sqrt(l);
02802 
02803     if (l == 0.0) {
02804         normal[0] = 0.0f;
02805         normal[1] = 0.0f;
02806         normal[2] = 1.0f;
02807 
02808         return;
02809     }
02810     else l = 1.0f / l;
02811 
02812     n[0] *= l;
02813     n[1] *= l;
02814     n[2] *= l;
02815     
02816     normal[0] = (float) n[0];
02817     normal[1] = (float) n[1];
02818     normal[2] = (float) n[2];
02819 }
02820 
02821 void mesh_calc_poly_normal(MPoly *mpoly, MLoop *loopstart, 
02822                            MVert *mvarray, float no[3])
02823 {
02824     if (mpoly->totloop > 4) {
02825         mesh_calc_ngon_normal(mpoly, loopstart, mvarray, no);
02826     }
02827     else if (mpoly->totloop == 3) {
02828         normal_tri_v3(no,
02829                       mvarray[loopstart[0].v].co,
02830                       mvarray[loopstart[1].v].co,
02831                       mvarray[loopstart[2].v].co
02832                       );
02833     }
02834     else if (mpoly->totloop == 4) {
02835         normal_quad_v3(no,
02836                        mvarray[loopstart[0].v].co,
02837                        mvarray[loopstart[1].v].co,
02838                        mvarray[loopstart[2].v].co,
02839                        mvarray[loopstart[3].v].co
02840                        );
02841     }
02842     else { /* horrible, two sided face! */
02843         no[0] = 0.0;
02844         no[1] = 0.0;
02845         no[2] = 1.0;
02846     }
02847 }
02848 /* duplicate of function above _but_ takes coords rather then mverts */
02849 static void mesh_calc_ngon_normal_coords(MPoly *mpoly, MLoop *loopstart,
02850                                          const float (*vertex_coords)[3], float normal[3])
02851 {
02852 
02853     const float *v1, *v2, *v3;
02854     double u[3], v[3], w[3];
02855     double n[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, l;
02856     int i;
02857 
02858     for (i = 0; i < mpoly->totloop; i++) {
02859         v1 = (const float *)(vertex_coords + loopstart[i].v);
02860         v2 = (const float *)(vertex_coords + loopstart[(i+1)%mpoly->totloop].v);
02861         v3 = (const float *)(vertex_coords + loopstart[(i+2)%mpoly->totloop].v);
02862 
02863         copy_v3db_v3fl(u, v1);
02864         copy_v3db_v3fl(v, v2);
02865         copy_v3db_v3fl(w, v3);
02866 
02867         /*this fixes some weird numerical error*/
02868         if (i==0) {
02869             u[0] += 0.0001f;
02870             u[1] += 0.0001f;
02871             u[2] += 0.0001f;
02872         }
02873 
02874         n[0] += (u[1] - v[1]) * (u[2] + v[2]);
02875         n[1] += (u[2] - v[2]) * (u[0] + v[0]);
02876         n[2] += (u[0] - v[0]) * (u[1] + v[1]);
02877     }
02878 
02879     l = n[0]*n[0]+n[1]*n[1]+n[2]*n[2];
02880     l = sqrt(l);
02881 
02882     if (l == 0.0) {
02883         normal[0] = 0.0f;
02884         normal[1] = 0.0f;
02885         normal[2] = 1.0f;
02886 
02887         return;
02888     }
02889     else {
02890         l = 1.0f / l;
02891     }
02892 
02893     n[0] *= l;
02894     n[1] *= l;
02895     n[2] *= l;
02896 
02897     normal[0] = (float) n[0];
02898     normal[1] = (float) n[1];
02899     normal[2] = (float) n[2];
02900 }
02901 
02902 void mesh_calc_poly_normal_coords(MPoly *mpoly, MLoop *loopstart,
02903                            const float (*vertex_coords)[3], float no[3])
02904 {
02905     if (mpoly->totloop > 4) {
02906         mesh_calc_ngon_normal_coords(mpoly, loopstart, vertex_coords, no);
02907     }
02908     else if (mpoly->totloop == 3) {
02909         normal_tri_v3(no,
02910                       vertex_coords[loopstart[0].v],
02911                       vertex_coords[loopstart[1].v],
02912                       vertex_coords[loopstart[2].v]
02913                       );
02914     }
02915     else if (mpoly->totloop == 4) {
02916         normal_quad_v3(no,
02917                        vertex_coords[loopstart[0].v],
02918                        vertex_coords[loopstart[1].v],
02919                        vertex_coords[loopstart[2].v],
02920                        vertex_coords[loopstart[3].v]
02921                        );
02922     }
02923     else { /* horrible, two sided face! */
02924         no[0] = 0.0;
02925         no[1] = 0.0;
02926         no[2] = 1.0;
02927     }
02928 }
02929 
02930 static void mesh_calc_ngon_center(MPoly *mpoly, MLoop *loopstart,
02931                                   MVert *mvert, float cent[3])
02932 {
02933     const float w= 1.0f / (float)mpoly->totloop;
02934     int i;
02935 
02936     zero_v3(cent);
02937 
02938     for (i = 0; i < mpoly->totloop; i++) {
02939         madd_v3_v3fl(cent, mvert[(loopstart++)->v].co, w);
02940     }
02941 }
02942 
02943 void mesh_calc_poly_center(MPoly *mpoly, MLoop *loopstart,
02944                            MVert *mvarray, float cent[3])
02945 {
02946     if (mpoly->totloop == 3) {
02947         cent_tri_v3(cent,
02948                     mvarray[loopstart[0].v].co,
02949                     mvarray[loopstart[1].v].co,
02950                     mvarray[loopstart[2].v].co
02951                     );
02952     }
02953     else if (mpoly->totloop == 4) {
02954         cent_quad_v3(cent,
02955                      mvarray[loopstart[0].v].co,
02956                      mvarray[loopstart[1].v].co,
02957                      mvarray[loopstart[2].v].co,
02958                      mvarray[loopstart[3].v].co
02959                      );
02960     }
02961     else {
02962         mesh_calc_ngon_center(mpoly, loopstart, mvarray, cent);
02963     }
02964 }
02965 
02966 /* note, passing polynormal is only a speedup so we can skip calculating it */
02967 float mesh_calc_poly_area(MPoly *mpoly, MLoop *loopstart,
02968                           MVert *mvarray, float polynormal[3])
02969 {
02970     if (mpoly->totloop == 3) {
02971         return area_tri_v3(mvarray[loopstart[0].v].co,
02972                            mvarray[loopstart[1].v].co,
02973                            mvarray[loopstart[2].v].co
02974                            );
02975     }
02976     else if (mpoly->totloop == 4) {
02977         return area_quad_v3(mvarray[loopstart[0].v].co,
02978                             mvarray[loopstart[1].v].co,
02979                             mvarray[loopstart[2].v].co,
02980                             mvarray[loopstart[3].v].co
02981                             );
02982     }
02983     else {
02984         int i;
02985         MLoop *l_iter = loopstart;
02986         float area, polynorm_local[3], (*vertexcos)[3];
02987         float *no= polynormal ? polynormal : polynorm_local;
02988         BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(vertexcos, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, mpoly->totloop, __func__);
02989 
02990         /* pack vertex cos into an array for area_poly_v3 */
02991         for (i = 0; i < mpoly->totloop; i++, l_iter++) {
02992             copy_v3_v3(vertexcos[i], mvarray[l_iter->v].co);
02993         }
02994 
02995         /* need normal for area_poly_v3 as well */
02996         if (polynormal == NULL) {
02997             mesh_calc_poly_normal(mpoly, loopstart, mvarray, no);
02998         }
02999 
03000         /* finally calculate the area */
03001         area = area_poly_v3(mpoly->totloop, vertexcos, no);
03002 
03003         BLI_array_fixedstack_free(vertexcos);
03004 
03005         return area;
03006     }
03007 }
03008 
03009 /* Find the index of the loop in 'poly' which references vertex,
03010  * returns -1 if not found */
03011 int poly_find_loop_from_vert(const MPoly *poly, const MLoop *loopstart,
03012                              unsigned vert)
03013 {
03014     int j;
03015     for (j = 0; j < poly->totloop; j++, loopstart++) {
03016         if (loopstart->v == vert)
03017             return j;
03018     }
03019     
03020     return -1;
03021 }
03022 
03023 /* Fill 'adj_r' with the loop indices in 'poly' adjacent to the
03024  * vertex. Returns the index of the loop matching vertex, or -1 if the
03025  * vertex is not in 'poly' */
03026 int poly_get_adj_loops_from_vert(unsigned adj_r[3], const MPoly *poly,
03027                                  const MLoop *mloop, unsigned vert)
03028 {
03029     int corner = poly_find_loop_from_vert(poly,
03030                                           &mloop[poly->loopstart],
03031                                           vert);
03032         
03033     if (corner != -1) {
03034         const MLoop *ml = &mloop[poly->loopstart + corner];
03035 
03036         /* vertex was found */
03037         adj_r[0] = ME_POLY_LOOP_PREV(mloop, poly, corner)->v;
03038         adj_r[1] = ml->v;
03039         adj_r[2] = ME_POLY_LOOP_NEXT(mloop, poly, corner)->v;
03040     }
03041 
03042     return corner;
03043 }
03044 
03045 /* update the hide flag for edges and faces from the corresponding
03046  * flag in verts */
03047 void mesh_flush_hidden_from_verts(const MVert *mvert,
03048                                   const MLoop *mloop,
03049                                   MEdge *medge, int totedge,
03050                                   MPoly *mpoly, int totpoly)
03051 {
03052     int i, j;
03053     
03054     for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++) {
03055         MEdge *e = &medge[i];
03056         if (mvert[e->v1].flag & ME_HIDE ||
03057            mvert[e->v2].flag & ME_HIDE)
03058             e->flag |= ME_HIDE;
03059         else
03060             e->flag &= ~ME_HIDE;
03061     }
03062     for (i = 0; i < totpoly; i++) {
03063         MPoly *p = &mpoly[i];
03064         p->flag &= ~ME_HIDE;
03065         for (j = 0; j < p->totloop; j++) {
03066             if (mvert[mloop[p->loopstart + j].v].flag & ME_HIDE)
03067                 p->flag |= ME_HIDE;
03068         }
03069     }
03070 }
03071 
03072 /* basic vertex data functions */
03073 int minmax_mesh(Mesh *me, float min[3], float max[3])
03074 {
03075     int i= me->totvert;
03076     MVert *mvert;
03077     for (mvert= me->mvert; i--; mvert++) {
03078         DO_MINMAX(mvert->co, min, max);
03079     }
03080     
03081     return (me->totvert != 0);
03082 }
03083 
03084 int mesh_center_median(Mesh *me, float cent[3])
03085 {
03086     int i= me->totvert;
03087     MVert *mvert;
03088     zero_v3(cent);
03089     for (mvert= me->mvert; i--; mvert++) {
03090         add_v3_v3(cent, mvert->co);
03091     }
03092     /* otherwise we get NAN for 0 verts */
03093     if (me->totvert) {
03094         mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f/(float)me->totvert);
03095     }
03096 
03097     return (me->totvert != 0);
03098 }
03099 
03100 int mesh_center_bounds(Mesh *me, float cent[3])
03101 {
03102     float min[3], max[3];
03103     INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
03104     if (minmax_mesh(me, min, max)) {
03105         mid_v3_v3v3(cent, min, max);
03106         return 1;
03107     }
03108 
03109     return 0;
03110 }
03111 
03112 void mesh_translate(Mesh *me, float offset[3], int do_keys)
03113 {
03114     int i= me->totvert;
03115     MVert *mvert;
03116     for (mvert= me->mvert; i--; mvert++) {
03117         add_v3_v3(mvert->co, offset);
03118     }
03119     
03120     if (do_keys && me->key) {
03121         KeyBlock *kb;
03122         for (kb=me->key->block.first; kb; kb=kb->next) {
03123             float *fp= kb->data;
03124             for (i= kb->totelem; i--; fp+=3) {
03125                 add_v3_v3(fp, offset);
03126             }
03127         }
03128     }
03129 }
03130 
03131 
03132 void BKE_mesh_ensure_navmesh(Mesh *me)
03133 {
03134     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&me->pdata, CD_RECAST)) {
03135         int i;
03136         int numFaces = me->totpoly;
03137         int *recastData;
03138         CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->pdata, CD_RECAST, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numFaces, "recastData");
03139         recastData = (int*)CustomData_get_layer(&me->pdata, CD_RECAST);
03140         for (i=0; i<numFaces; i++) {
03141             recastData[i] = i+1;
03142         }
03143         CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->pdata, CD_RECAST, CD_REFERENCE, recastData, numFaces, "recastData");
03144     }
03145 }
03146 
03147 void BKE_mesh_tessface_calc(Mesh *mesh)
03148 {
03149     mesh->totface = mesh_recalcTessellation(&mesh->fdata, &mesh->ldata, &mesh->pdata,
03150                                            mesh->mvert,
03151                                            mesh->totface, mesh->totloop, mesh->totpoly,
03152                                            /* calc normals right after, don't copy from polys here */
03153                                            FALSE);
03154 
03155     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(mesh, TRUE);
03156 }
03157 
03158 void BKE_mesh_tessface_ensure(Mesh *mesh)
03159 {
03160     if (mesh->totpoly && mesh->totface == 0) {
03161         BKE_mesh_tessface_calc(mesh);
03162     }
03163 }
03164 
03165 void BKE_mesh_tessface_clear(Mesh *mesh)
03166 {
03167     mesh_tessface_clear_intern(mesh, TRUE);
03168 }
